review:
I have never reviewed an app before but really feel compelled to for Balance. 2022 was unfortunately a very terrible year for me due to personal loss, mental health, and a soul crushing ending to a 10+ years long relationship, and as usual it seemed like all of these things hit at the same time. I was struggling so badly and really didn‚Äôt think I was going to make it through at times. While trying to get medical help, I found the free year of Balance offer somewhere and figured it couldn‚Äôt hurt to try at that point, though I‚Äôd never really been a big believer in meditation.
 
I am so happy to admit how wrong I was- this app helped my emotional health so much before and after I got the additional help I needed.  The sleep modules in particular were so helpful- Ofosu‚Äôs voice alone is so calming and peaceful, and the meditations really help my mind stop wandering until it can relax and I can fall asleep. There are so many great non-sleep modules as well for different situations - it seems like there‚Äôs something there anytime I need it. Sometimes I go in knowing I will feel emotional, but sometimes it sneaks up on me in an unexpected and beautiful way too. I just purchased the lifetime plan- even though I don‚Äôt rely on this as a crutch like I used to, it has become something I want to do instead of something I have to do to get though the day.
title: This app helped me through the worst year of my life.

review:
This app is beyond amazing! I love it so much. All of the single meditations are like little bites of joy when you need it, or a helping hand for the soul if things are rocky. I was already using another well-known app pretty regularly, but the set-up of this one is just perfect. You can choose to follow along with a plan or open the app up for a quick single meditation based on your specific need at the time. And the best part is, you can choose the duration of time that works specifically for you. Usually it‚Äôs 5 or 10 minutes but with some, they go down to 3 minutes or up to 15. I cannot say enough good things about this app. Thank you for being so kind and generous with your software during this wild time; it does not go unnoticed. I will happily sign up for the paid subscription to this beautiful app when the time comes. 
‚ù§Ô∏èü§∏‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Some kind suggestions:
I would love to see more single meditations added on a regular basis, or different variations of the same ones. For instance, with the concentrate meditation, I was surprised that it didn‚Äôt include visualization. On that note, I would LOVE to see an entire guided plan for visualization practice/learning how to visualize. It would be cool if there was a log to see which meditations you did on which days. Also, different breathing techniques included in different meditations ‚Äî I adore the ‚Äòenergize‚Äô single. That‚Äôs all for now. Thank you again, you beautiful humans! xoxo
title: ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ A M A Z I N G ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢

review: I had been hearing the many benefits that meditation has to offer, but hadn‚Äôt ever tried it. I was skeptical at first but I downloaded the Balance application just to see what all the fuss was about. I was absolutely amazed that after only one session, I felt so calm, relaxed and just better in general. I guess I wasn‚Äôt aware of exactly how tense and stressed I was. I have since recommended this app to all of my family and friends and they too are very impressed. With all the things we have going on day to day, we tend to forget to take care of ourselves and we don‚Äôt realize how important self are is. The Balance app does just that, it helps you balance and manage those day to day stresses and make life more manageable and enjoyable. There‚Äôs truth in the saying ‚Äúyou need to stop and smell the roses,‚Äù and this wellness app helps you do that! I love the fact that Balance makes a personalized program to suit each individual‚Äôs needs based on how you answer questions within the app. There are also ‚Äúsingles‚Äù you can do that are helpful if you‚Äôre feeling a certain way or having trouble sleeping or focusing etc‚Ä¶I‚Äôm not usually one to write a review on an application but I highly recommend this app to everyone!! If you are open to exploring the benefits that meditation has to offer and want balance and wellness in your life, then this is the app for you!!
title: Best and favorite app by far!!

review:
I‚Äôve wanted to build a meditation practice for a long time.  After trying numerous apps, I just gave up.  I either fell asleep each time or my mind wandered constantly.  I just couldn‚Äôt get it.

When I received an email to try this new Balance app, I thought to myself, ‚Äújust try one more time.‚Äù  I‚Äôm so glad I did.  I now have a streak of 34 days, and find myself taking moments throughout the day to just close my eyes and use the skills I‚Äôve been learning without using the app.  It‚Äôs changing my life.  I pay more attention to what I‚Äôm doing.  I find that I listen better in conversations.  Just an overall improvement in my awareness and peace in general.

This app worked for me because it started off with short sessions and easy skills and builds from there.  I now find myself wanting to do the longer sessions.  I love that this program builds on the success of each session and gives you multiple techniques for your meditation toolkit.  Initially, I was disappointed that each meditation didn‚Äôt have some soothing spa music.  Now I‚Äôve come to welcome the silence because I can really hear myself.  This is a fantastic app and I can‚Äôt wait to see where it goes from here.  Please know that I‚Äôve never written an app review in my life, so this is the highest compliment I can possibly give.  Thank you for making meditation so accessible and easy to develop into an everyday practice.
title: Finally, a meditation app that works for me!

review:
If you‚Äôre looking for a pretty, consumer-driven app that‚Äôll charge you for their good looks and trendy appeal, this is not it. It‚Äôs obvious that this company actually has a true passion for helping people, judging by the work they‚Äôve put into it and their free one year subscription! Their methods are evidence-based, no frills, and straight to the point so you can focus on learning and progressing your meditation practice without the type of trendy mind-clutter you get from Calm. Of all the meditation apps I‚Äôve tried, Balance is the most user-friendly. It‚Äôs well-organized, tracks your progress across different skill sets, and although it‚Äôs evidence-based, it won‚Äôt overwhelm the lay person with scientific details. Though if you do prefer more scientific explanations, I would recommend pairing this app with FitMind. I find that they complement each other quite well. (FitMind also has accessible options for those who can‚Äôt afford their prices). 

Running this type of business requires hard work, and providing one year of it for free is unheard of in this broken capitalist society. Thank you Balance, for making this invaluable service accessible to everyone. As a broke grad student this means the world to me, and I promise I‚Äôll get a job when I graduate so I can give you my money.
title: Eternally grateful for this app

review: Halfway through my graduate school program and the tragic death of my mother, dealing with my father‚Äôs grief, as well as my own, my stress level was so high, it put me in the hospital. I discovered Balance through Instagram. I‚Äôve always been reluctant of ‚Äúmeditation‚Äù but after my first session, I cried because almost everything I was suppressing was slowly revealed. Suddenly, I realized that there was now someone who was willing to listen, had the patience to wait until I was ready, help me through the chaos, and made me realize that my emotional needs are not being met by those closest to me. In the past seven years, I‚Äôve been taking on the problems of those who can‚Äôt seem to handle their own, and I have been neglecting myself in the worst way. Sometimes, I didn‚Äôt think I was going to make it. I underestimated the power of taking a few moments to myself to focus, re-center, to be selfish for 10 minutes or less, and to know that if I am not functioning properly, everything else goes by the wayside. What an incredible difference Balance has made in only two sessions! Honestly, I find myself looking forward to the next session because it‚Äôs a place that I find solitude. My mom always said, ‚ÄúA person who really loves you, will guard your solitude.‚Äù
title: An Incredible Difference

review: Okay so this review might be kinda long but I swear just read it. I have to say, this app is perfection. I play the meditations when I want to sleep if I seem to be having insomnia or even if I‚Äôm not having sleep problems because it makes my sleep that much better. I use Leah‚Äôs voice (there‚Äôs a male and female voice so you can choose what one you want)  and anyway it works like a charm every night. I loved it so much that I played it for my sister one night and she actually fell asleep in minutes. The vibrated meditations are super calming too, and keep my mind at ease since I usually visualize things as I‚Äôm thinking (especially at night). I haven‚Äôt tried every meditation but some let you answer a few quick questions before you start to make it even more personal, one example being the frustration meditation (I think that‚Äôs what it‚Äôs called). One time I was absolutely LIVID because of someone, and the meditation really gave me some perspective and calmed me down in the heat of the moment. Thank you so much to Balance for the free year, I‚Äôll definitely be purchasing it when I can, and I have sent a link to get the app to my sister so she can continue to fall asleep in minutes.
title: The best for sleep, waking up, or calming down :) I love it

review: As someone who never mediated and was uninformed regarding this topic, I couldn‚Äôt see how just simply closing your eyes and sitting in silence could have any benefits‚Ä¶.And that‚Äôs true because it doesn‚Äôt, because that‚Äôs not what mediation is at all. It‚Äôs actually way more layered and complex than I had ever imagined. I was so wrong about all of it. The idea of meditating seemed counter intuitive through the lens of anxiety and adult ADHD, both of which have kept me in constant motion from task to task. So I figured meditating would just increase my anxiety and make me more restless so I made up facts about it to myself and never tried. The barrier to entry is always what makes trying new things hard but for mediation Balance was a seamless and relaxingly simple experience. I started out with only 3 mins a day and instantly felt my stress, anxiety, restlessness dissipate, while my focus and mood improve drastically. Honestly I used to think the only way to feel this kind of relaxation and lowered anxiety was from a few drinks‚Ä¶..it‚Äôs great to know there is a much better, healthier and sustainable option. 10/10 I would recommend Balance to everyone and I‚Äôve suggest it to everyone I care about.
title: I genuinely thought meditation was Nonsense

review:
I enjoy this app a lot. I‚Äôve been a subscriber of Headspace for years and like it, but Balance is more engaging for me. I like that it has a small element of gamification that shows you your ‚Äúlevels‚Äù and experience in certain meditation techniques. I find the guy‚Äôs voice really relaxing. I also like that it is personalized, asks questions about where you are at on your meditation journey, and shares little bite sized information tidbits about how certain techniques are beneficial for us and why.

Engaging, modern, interactive app that looks clean, easy to navigate, intuitive, and I even like the little sounds when you expand an information tidbit. It feels like a mediation app that‚Äôs been brought up to today‚Äôs standards of ease of use, personalization, data and being fun to use. I‚Äôve struggled to keep to a habit with meditation but I find Balance makes me *want* to MAKE time for it, rather than maybe doing it if I have time for it. 

I have ADHD and get bored easily. I tried Balance when accidentally stumbling on an article about it when looking up smart health gadgets. Liked the idea of it. Really glad I did. This is now my primary meditation app instead of Headspace.
title: Personalized, smart meditation. Best app I‚Äôve used

review: I‚Äôm writing this review after a week of using balance. I‚Äôm just a week I‚Äôve noticed a lot has changed within myself. Not big changes yet but I‚Äôm sure with more use that will change. I feel more positive. I also feel more motivated after each meditation. It encourages me to do chores around the house before it becomes a problem vs back then when I let the dishes get ridiculously stacked and the house get really dirty. I‚Äôve used the S.O.S. single about 2 times now. Both times I was crying and feeling so much anxiety and stress. Both times I was having an anxiety attack, and both times I felt better and calm after taking the S.O.S. meditation session. I suffer and yes I do mean suffer, from depression and anxiety. I‚Äôm currently also coming off my meds with decreased dosage. This app came at the perfect time. I‚Äôve had high stress due to covid-19 as well. I rarely do anything at the house because I have so little energy and intense mental drainage. Life feels almost impossible at times but thank God this app came into my life because oof I‚Äôd be lost without it. I recommend trying it for at least a week and really relying on the singles for a week to get a taste of what this app can do for you. Definitely worth it.
title: Amazing!

review: I have long sought a way to learn meditation that would work for me. All felt too long at first, and asked for most focus than a beginner could ever have. This App is OUTSTANDING. Short times at first, yet the meditation WORKS. 5 days in, I extended my time to the longest available and was sad two days in a row when it was done so soon! Currently on the 7 day free trial before paying for a year, as of 2 minutes ago. I want more! I want to meditate as long as my brain will allow, and it‚Äôs currently so worth the subscription to me! I will be exploring the benifits of a paid subscription over these 7 days, and will come to update what I decided. Already, was thrilled to be able to move onto the next step in my plan tonight without waiting until tomorrow. Excited to see the other plans it unlocks. I‚Äôm a believer!! When I finish every night I sincerely feel... better. Peaceful. Calm. Working in a retirement community during COVID, this is a big deal. I told someone last week I am on the verge of a mental breakdown. I am feeling like that is lessening and I feel stringer daily in my head and emotions. If that improves with the added features of a subscription, it is worth WAY more than $50 a year to me!
title: Impressed

review: I couldn‚Äôt agree with Jared who also took the words out of my mouth. Although I have been through some formal trading in a grip setting with a Counsler and even have a therapist this app is fantastic. It‚Äôs starts you off slow and had me actually pick up on some of the things I missed in my class. They start you off slow and ask you personal questions so that they may build the sessions around you on a personal level. I love that! It‚Äôs like a real one one and it keep me wanting more. I retired now at 55 with a full pension with Medical and now I watch a spend time with my grandchildren. But who would have ever thought the rest of my life sound peaches and cream. I suffer from anxiety and stress that I know I bring upon myself which gets me physically and emotionally sick! I can‚Äôt watch my grandchildren like that. I have to be wit a sound mind loving and caring and let go and let God. I love this app as it allows me to do just that!!! Please continue to grow and help others as this is a blessed app for all that need it!! Happy holidays to all and may you find your peace! ‚ù§Ô∏è
title: One of the Best if not the best Mindfulness meditation tool box in the market today!

review: I have been trying for years to get into mediation but it has never worked out for me. It was impossible to quiet my mind or keep myself from distraction, and I would end the sessions more frustrated than I started. From the first Balance mediation, I was hooked. What I needed was GUIDANCE‚Äî instruction, someone teaching me to mediation skills, not just mediations telling me to quiet my mind and me not knowing how to do that. I have mediated everyday since downloading this app, and each day I learn how to do it better and better, which makes me keep coming back. It‚Äôs the best app for meditation, hands down. The foundations classes are fantastic for this, but also the singles are great as well ‚Äî I use the wind down and sleep ones every night before bed, I‚Äôve used anxiety and SOS many times in acute emotional states. It‚Äôs helped me stop relying on substances as much to regulate my mood, because I‚Äôm able to do it with the skills I learned in this app, or I can turn to the app for help instead. I got it for free during their coronavirus promotion (bless them) but I will pay full price every year for this app because it is worth it. Try it out, change your life.
title: The only thing that has gotten me into mediation

review: I am writing this review after using Balance app for 6 months (got 1 year free). Will buy the full version soon. Have used all the meditations in the app whether it be a plans, singles or the immersive (these are pretty interesting too). Short summary 1) Bit size meditation will help you form the habit of getting into meditation which is pretty cool. 2) Each plan will develop a specific mental skill and continue to strengthen your mental well-being 3) Skills it will help you develop : Focus, Communication, Breathing, Relaxation, Concentration, Positivity, Labeling (i might be missing few) 4) Labeling skills is so great which allows mediator to bring back their focus if you wondered during meditation. 5) I like both meditators but Ofosu is my personal favorite. Overall i have learned over the period of time from great people that keeping myself happy is my responsibility 100% and no one else‚Äôs. I am fortunate that along the way , found Balance app which has changed my life for good. Disclaimer: This is not a paid review nor the balance app will ask you 100 times to provide a review. I wrote when I felt encouraged to write one.
title: Changed my life for good

review:
Truly, this app is outstanding. The way I‚Äôve built my meditation practice up from 0 and implement these teaching into everyday life is amazing. You learn and are encouraged to keep going even when you feel like you‚Äôre ‚Äúmessing up‚Äù. They really know what the pain points are for biking a strong meditation foundation and help you overcome those barriers. Also their rewards system in the app really does keep you engaged. They keep track of your days in a row that you‚Äôve practiced and I can‚Äôt tell you how many times I was thinking ‚Äúah I‚Äôll skip today‚Äù and remembered my streak and didn‚Äôt want to break it because I was so proud of how long I had stuck to it. They track your time and progress so you can really see how much work you‚Äôve done! 

All of the above is just what their foundations plans provide. They have soooo many other meditations for everything you might struggle with like eating, procrastinating, holiday stress you name it. It‚Äôs not just the normal ‚Äúreduce stress and find inner happiness‚Äù. They really do it all and I‚Äôm so grateful! Whenever I can afford to buy the lifetime membership I will because it‚Äôs truly that life altering to me. üíú
title: The best meditation app

review: I started using Balance when I clicked on an Instagram ad offering a yearly subscription for free. I‚Äôm a sucker for deals. I had tried some other meditation apps, but I just never stuck with any of them. I have a history with teaching mindfulness groups, so I do have some experience with this material. So far with Balance, I have a 41 day streak completing four foundations plans! I really love the layout of this app. They do a really good job of explaining different skills and it‚Äôs really interactive. You can click on icons and it gives you an explanation in case you forget what a term means. I appreciate the little quizzes before some of my meditations to keep the things I‚Äôve learned fresh. There is a lot of positive reinforcement and I‚Äôm constantly congratulated and reminded of how well I‚Äôm doing by simply just showing up and trying. I also love that they are interactive on Instagram. I‚Äôve attended two of the Instagram lives where Oofasu answers questions and does brief meditations. There is just something about the setup of this app and the people that I love, and I look forward to my daily goal of meditating. Thank you so much!
title: I am loving this app!

review: This app teaches you so much about different meditation techniques and it has been amazing for me. I struggle so much with letting go of strong emotions that I feel. When I‚Äôm sad, I‚Äôm sad for a long time. When I‚Äôm angry and frustrated, I can be angry and frustrated for the entire day. These guided meditation sessions have been able to help me let go of those emotions, not to push them down and to hide them, but to simply let go. It also helps me because I can get so caught up in my own thoughts that it becomes so tiresome being in my own mind. Meditation helps me shift my focus from those thoughts. I‚Äôve been trying to meditate at least once a day, and it‚Äôs a little difficult some days. But the days that I do take the time for myself to meditate, I feel lighter and happier and like I‚Äôm able to step out from under the dark cloud of frustration, stress, worries, fears, sadness, etc. I‚Äôve seen an improvement in myself over these past couple of months and if it‚Äôs something that you think would be helpful for you, I hope you can find solace through meditation.
title: I‚Äôve found solace through meditation

review: I am only on my third day of using the Balance app for daily meditation and am LOVING it! I am new to meditation, but have heard great things. I currently have a lot of stress with work and also manage anxiety, depression, and Bipolar disorder, so I am always looking for new tools to help maintain a healthy balance with my mood, and in life. Specifically so far I have appreciated the smooth calming voices, the positive encouragement and reinforcement, the education of the effects of meditation on the brain physically. I love that I am learning so much!! I also have had issues falling asleep and staying asleep lately, and the sleep stories and sounds have helped greatly! I would like to thank the creators, developers, and anyone else who has made this app what it is today. You are making a difference! I also appreciate that you have offered a free one year subscription(with the option to donate) to fully try out the app before committing to purchasing. Most apps offer one week, and that is just not enough time to fully know if the app fits a person‚Äôs needs and lifestyle. THANK YOU!!!
title: Fantastic!!

review: The meditations are aligned with your specific needs based on analysis which is one reason I left Headspace. I like that it builds on your level based on my input, asks how I felt about the meditation, reviews what I learned. It beats Headspace because it‚Äôs tailored to the individual and guides me to what plan I should work on using my data. The only improvement I would make is the badge system. There should be more badges to reach quickly to encourage continued use. I know there‚Äôs something towards intrinsic motivation but for something that many people aren‚Äôt used to including in their day, early accomplishments will motivate until it becomes a natural part of the day. It‚Äôs hard to get 10 days in a row but 3 days is doable for first timers. Also 10,000 minutes is almost 3 years of meditating daily for 10 minutes and there‚Äôs nothing in between 10 days and 10,000 minutes. That‚Äôs a huge gap. I doubt many people will reach that milestone so maybe remove the badges and just share how many days/hours of meditation or add more badges to encourage use.
title: Love this app!

review:
TLDR; please consider keeping smaller amounts of time for all of your Foundations courses, or at least a slower build up (5, 7, 10). 

In the Foundations courses, the jump from a choice of 5 or 10 minutes in Foundations 1 and 2 to only the choice of 10 or 15 minutes in Foundations 3 really turned me off. I know I would like to work up to 10 minutes, but I should be allowed to do that at my pace. I feel strong armed into it which makes me resist (plus, sometimes I really only can do the 5 minutes, which is actually more like 7-8 minutes with all the prep talk before meditation starts). So this shift in Balance also makes me feel somewhat ashamed that I‚Äôm not able to always delve into 10 minutes easily (or that I‚Äôm not taking that time for myself). I also know that I can do the singles, but I would like to continue on Foundations. I know this is all on me regarding the feelings, but if the app touches those pressure points, it means something‚Äôs not working. So, long story, please consider keeping smaller amounts of time for all of your Foundations courses, or at least a slower build up (5, 7, 10).
title: I really love this app but‚Ä¶

review:
First off, I really like the app. The sleep meditation narrator‚Äôs voice is extremely peaceful and helps you fall asleep quicker. The software is easy to use and well thought out. However, this ‚Äú1 year free trial‚Äù barely has any options. This is the only free trial I‚Äôve used where the software appeared to be fully locked. Free trial means you get the full app for a certain amount of time, to see if the subscription is worth the cost. Unless other options are unlocked through using the app, it appears as though they are locked due to being on the free trial version of the app. It‚Äôs not a free trial if the software is locked. Just saying. I cannot give this app a higher rating right now as I cannot use 99% of the features, therefore I cannot evaluate how they work. If more options open up during use or the developer addresses my concerns of locked software on a year free trial, I will update my rating.

Opened the app today and all items appear to now be unlocked. Unsure if it had a timer or the reasoning behind locking software. Updated to five stars.
title: Locked Trial?

review: I have been struggling for years to try and figure out how to release all my bottled up stress. I was an avid runner and went to the gym daily. I was in a car accident that has prevented me from being able to much of any physical activity. When I was stressed I would always go for a run but for the past six years that wasn‚Äôt an option. Since I was a small child I have also always struggled with severe anxiety and ADHD which makes it hard to focus. This app has given me many strategies to help stay grounded even during stressful times. I really enjoy the positive redirection and guidance during the meditation sessions. As my mind goes a million miles a minute it‚Äôs nice the app will help refocus your attention to the now moment. I also work in special education with low income students that have many struggles in their lives. I try to bring in coping skills from this app and else where into the classroom. This app has been a lifesaver. Also, if you enjoy the app there is a podcast that they host you may want to check out as well.
title: Fantastic app

review: Prior to subscribing to this app, I already had experienced life-changing benefits from meditating, using a meditation book as a guide. However, the tools I have been given through the practices in the Balance app are priceless. I have been using this for about a 1-1/2 years, and have finally become disciplined enough to use it almost daily. Today I completed one of the lessons within an advanced plan which took me three tries to complete (I was trying to do the meditation before bed and could not stay awake enough to complete it). Tonight I decided to do the lesson earlier in the evening while I was still wide awake but relatively relaxed. HOLY MOLY!! It was mind-blowing. I truly had a life-changing epiphany! The tools I acquired today will forever improve my life. I am so grateful. ‚Äî- Don‚Äôt miss out on the benefits of meditation and the Balance app. Leave yourself a note on your fridge or To Do list to use it every day as a reminder. You will be better, more at peace, spiritually freer. You will find yourself in charge of your happiness.
title: Profound personal growth using this app

review: I don‚Äôt leave reviews. Ever. This app is AMAZING. The plans are great. Even if you are experienced in meditation, the plans help you build onto what you already know. If you‚Äôre new to meditation this app has the foundations plans with different levels. You finish one plan and you move on to the next. The immersive music meditation is absolutely beautiful. All of the immersive meditations are beautiful and unique. I‚Äôve tried to find similar meditations on other apps or even on the web but can‚Äôt find them. They are unique to Balance. Balance has... well.... helped me find my balance. Over 15 hours spent meditating and it doesn‚Äôt get boring. They keep adding new plans and I can‚Äôt wait to finish them all. I‚Äôm currently on the Fear plan, the Fear plan isn‚Äôt my favorite one that I‚Äôve done so far but it‚Äôs still extremely helpful. Can‚Äôt wait to see what else is to come! If you‚Äôre new to meditation or want to deepen your meditation practice, get this app. You won‚Äôt be disappointed with its user friendly interface and it‚Äôs beautifully designed meditations.
title: Helped me to find my ‚ÄúBalance‚Äù

review: As someone that has dabbled with meditation at various points in my life I thought I knew what to do. It seems easy right?! But, I can say that actually doing this program and staying committed to it is really laying a beautiful foundation to build upon. I love that it is very customizable and even on the days when life is busy I am still able to keep my commitment to daily meditation. In the past I would feel overwhelmed about not getting everything ‚Äúright‚Äù with meditating or having wandering thoughts. The way balance addresses this, helps you to acknowledge, and bring it back is really encouraging. I love that today the message was meditation is a workout for your mind. This analogy gave me an immediate flashback of starting to workout when I was overweight and how ‚Äúbad‚Äù I was at it and I compared it to now and how strong I am. I found this app on an IG ad and I can 100% say I am so happy I followed this ad and joined! The free offer was enticing and I will stay committed to using this app even after I start paying for it.
title: Life changing!

review: Over the past 5 years, I‚Äôve used several apps and platforms for meditation and mindfulness, most of which have been helpful.  Balance is on another level.  Even though I have several years of experience, I decided to start the program at the beginner level, and I am so glad I did. I am re-learning old concepts, and material is being presented in a more academic style format that is extremely effective in its delivery.  I‚Äôve only completed 4 modules at 10-15 minutes each and I feel like I have absorbed more than my entire ‚Äòcareer‚Äô of practicing mindfulness.  The sessions are typically focused on a particular skill, and then as you progress it builds on previous knowledge.  I feel more confident than  ever that I will get the most out my mindfulness practice now that I‚Äôm going through this series.  I actually look forward to my daily sessions now.  I got my first year free, but I would absolutely purchase this program if it hadn‚Äôt been free.  It is an incredible value for your time.
title: Best for learning to meditate

review: My sister suggested Balance to me a over 6 months ago and now I‚Äôm suggesting it to my Friday and family. I can feel myself changing, I have gained the skills through meditation to calm myself when stressful moments come up. I have learned to be kinder to myself, I no longer dwell on negative thoughts. Balance has guided me to a new way to think about everyday thoughts that arise and it‚Äôs provided me the skills to embrace every one of them. I am so grateful for this app, it‚Äôs really difficult to put into words. I‚Äôve tried other meditation apps but there‚Äôs something about Balance, maybe it‚Äôs Ofosu‚Äôs voice!!! His voice is so calming and comforting, I feel like he‚Äôs actually there with me. What can I say? I love everything about this app, even on days where I don‚Äôt have 20-30 minutes to meditate there are options for a 10 minute daily meditation. I  enjoying all the skills I am building for myself and I‚Äôm more in tune with my thoughts and how to approach them. Thank you Balance‚ô•Ô∏è
title: So Grateful For This App

review:
I have used other meditation apps and they are either overloaded with too much stuff I don‚Äôt care about or don‚Äôt really teach you the basics of meditation. I love how this app builds on each skill and explains the reasoning behind doing it and clarifies what you might be thinking when doing it. I actually was able to use the skills in learned in the first few lessons in real life to calm my anxiety. 

Furthermore it really is a free year. It seems a lot of people in the reviews don‚Äôt understand how to navigate an app or how to cancel a subscription before it renews. There is an option to donate a few different amounts for the year or to use it completely free so don‚Äôt let those reviews dissuade you from downloading this truly fantastic app. I will be deleting my other meditation apps and purchasing the lifetime membership in a bit. 

Please keep this app clean and simple like it is and don‚Äôt jumble it up with an overwhelming amount of weird content I don‚Äôt care about üôèüèª
title: Actually teaches you to meditate

review:
I started using Balance during COVID and it‚Äôs now been three years of using this app daily. I had tried meditating using other apps, mainly Headspace and Calm. I found both overwhelming and the apps were bloated with features. I even had a subscription for free and never used it :/
Balance does such a great job at keeping things simple. You just open the app and can get right to a meditation. I love that there is no decision fatigue because it‚Äôs super curated. 
Leah is the most amazing coach. Her voice is so soothing, but not robotic. She finds the balance between calm and not cheesy. 
I have completed almost every plan in the app. I wish there were more. I think the app is moving more towards being a sleep support app. The new meditations are only the Individual ones. Those are fine, but I like the plans because they‚Äôre a curated set of meditations that compliment and grow from each other. You really feel like you‚Äôre accomplishing something with each meditation. 
My one recommendation to the app designer is to make the meditation intros optional. Please include a SKIP button. There are three or more questions you are required to answer before the meditation even begins and it‚Äôs super annoying. 
Also, there is a transition state after finishing the questions, which claims to be personalizing the meditation. But just close the app and it skips it! Best bug ever. Please keep this!
Thank you for making such a wonderful app. Has absolutely been life changing.
title: Life changing app

review: I have wanted to have meditation be a core part of my routine for a long while now. For the last two years, I have ardently fought finding this journey through an app. I didn‚Äôt want to have yet another routine dependent on a gadget. But I realized that depleting my energy by resisting the support of an app was beginning to outweigh the benefits of starting somewhere. I share this because Balance has addressed my trepidations of app-based meditation instructions. The UI/UX is thoughtfully designed to not have the app be the core focus. It doesn‚Äôt ping me everyday for my attention. It is there when I am ready for it. It‚Äôs Ofosu‚Äôs coaching and guidance that has made it stick for me. I especially love the feedback loop, which accurately personalizes the meditation foundation for my needs. Thank you, Balance and Ofosu, for this incredible contribution to our community. I have my good days and my bad about the tech world (as someone who works in it too!), and you have proven all of the benefits that it can have, when done right.
title: I finally got unstuck thanks to Balance

review:
This app has helped my family and me to get a better nights sleep over the past year through the one-year free trial that they offer. The app is unique as it offers a new customized meditation every day. They have a good variety of meditations for kids and my daughter loves to choose what to listen to based on the pictures. The more I explored this app, the more surprised I was by the amazing variety that this app offers. I used this app frequently over the last year and still found new and surprising features. The team that put this together seem to really care about keeping things fresh.

There really is only one issue. This app does not support family sharing. I was about to purchase the lifetime subscription, but I would have had to buy it twice so my wife could have it on her phone to help put the kids to sleep when mine wasn‚Äôt available. 

I really could not recommend this app more. I have searched for other apps that do support family sharing, but the most they could offer was a small selection of pre-recorded meditations that will stay the same when you listen to them multiple times. Balance shines when it comes to audio quality. Most other meditation apps just don‚Äôt sound nearly as relaxing.

If you are in a situation like mine and you can afford it, I would highly recommend getting the lifetime subscription to this app. I just couldn‚Äôt afford to pay for two subscriptions just for my wife and I to listen together on one device 95% of the time anyway.
title: Fantastic app!

review: I typically never write reviews for an app because I tend to think that most apps for me are just used to pass time. I really love this app, I downloaded It about 30 minutes ago because of an ad I seen on instagram saying a free year trial, have to say that when this trial is up I‚Äôm most likely going to renew it. It‚Äôs awesome. It‚Äôs asks you questions at the beginning so it can personalize things that are aimed directly towards helping you as an individual. Covers a wide variety of things you can do. I‚Äôm really restless when it comes time to try to sleep and I was testing through the features of the app and found one where it helps you towards not biting your nails anymore, as I struggle with that. Anyway, within 5-10 minutes I was in an extremely relaxed state of mind and didn‚Äôt feel like my mind was running rampant. I would have fallen asleep if I wasn‚Äôt purposely trying to stay awake to test the rest of the app. Amazing. Would 100% recommend
title: Love this app!

review: First of all, I never write reviews. NEVER. But this app is helping me SO much and I had to share in case it helps someone else in a similar situation. I have never really meditated but have always been interested, just wouldn‚Äôt carve out the time to do it. The Instagram promotion for a free year of Balance caught me at exactly the right time‚Äîgoing through a difficult breakup and finding myself experiencing lots of confusion, anxiety, negative thoughts, self-doubt, fear you name it. I have been waking up sad, grieving, lots of rumination and swirling thoughts, but after taking time to go through a 5 minute guided mediation after waking, I find that my brain feels more clear, I‚Äôm a little less anxious and slightly more positive/invigorated. These are fractional improvements, but improvements nonetheless and I‚Äôm grateful for that. I‚Äôm only on day 4 of the Foundations program and can‚Äôt wait to see how my brain transforms over the next few weeks, months, and year.
title: More calm, clarity, peace post-breakup

review: As someone who has meditated for years, I felt the need to have a refresh and broadening of my skill set. This app appealed to me because of it‚Äôs claim to adapt to the user based on usage and feedback, and that it has plans for people who have more experience with meditation. I succeeded in my goals to refresh and expand my skill set, and I‚Äôm actually still using it daily. However, I wish there was an unguided option that is *completely* unguided, since even the ‚Äúunguided‚Äù single still has vocal cues. There are times where I still want a minimal reminder of how much time has passed. So, I still use a different popular meditation app that has an open-ended meditation option, which has further options such as no bells or a bell after a certain time interval. I truly hope the Balance app adds this option, because it seems very easy to do, and the other app has these options as a free feature in their app.
title: My favorite meditation app, but‚Ä¶

review:
I am REALLY enjoying Balance. I signed up for it because they advertised a free year, which is pretty incredible these days! I have tried a few other meditation apps but nothing really stuck, and I‚Äôll be honest I‚Äôm still new to this one too, but it feels different. 

Reasons I love it:
‚Ä¢ The Design: Hats off to the designers and developers, you guys did a fabulous job of making a pretty, minimalist, and not-distracting app (which are my favorite qualities in an app). 
‚Ä¢ Customization: From the first moment in the app, you begin creating a custom program based on your needs (stress management, focus etc), and from there you can even choose the voice of your Guide. You are also able to choose the length of meditation you wish to complete, so whether you‚Äôre overwhelmed by the idea of sitting still for 10 minutes or just ‚Äúdon‚Äôt have time‚Äù you can always fit it in. 
‚Ä¢ Content: The techniques used in the program I am following feel far more effective in capturing my attention than other apps I‚Äôve tried. I feels like a it clicking more this time. There are also lots of to choose from when you are in need of something specific. 

So while I am still new here, I am very much enjoying it. All of the above factors make this app worth revisiting on a consistent basis. So if you‚Äôve been in the market for a meditation app or just want to try a new one, I would highly recommend Balance!
title: Favorite Meditation App for Newbies

review:
Very disappointed. I saw an ad offering a free year subscription to try out this app. Looked it over. Set up an account. Jumped through all the ‚Äúlet‚Äôs get started‚Äù hoops. Was very excited & hopeful. Only to find that the ‚Äúfree year offer‚Äù, is only ‚Äúfree‚Äù once you load enough money to cover the price of a year‚Äôs subscription into your Apple account. 
I realize that this isn‚Äôt the only company that does this. I just got so hopeful and liked what I saw(I‚Äôve been wanting something like this for so long)that I jumped in, forgetting that so many apps use this crappy tactic. 
I do not keep an Apple Wallet or keep any large amounts of money in my Apple app. Nor will I ever! I only keep the barest minimum to cover what few things I wish to purchase. And I load that through small increments gift cards. I will never attach my credit card / use Apple Wallet. I am not comfortable with either option. 
If I had benefited as hoped from my ‚Äúfree‚Äù year, I would have continued on, with at least monthly purchases as I could, OR a year if possible. 
So, a waste of time and thanks for getting my hopes up. I‚Äôm so tired of this crap. üòñFREE isn‚Äôt Free-with-strings-attached. Your version of ‚ÄúFree‚Äù is bogus.
title: Free year‚Ä¶ not. Deleting.

review:
I can‚Äôt rave enough about how much I‚Äôm enjoying this app. I struggle with focus (ADHD,PTSD). I‚Äôve been trying various apps for months. And now I‚Äôve been consistent for over a week now. I actually look forward to opening the app. I crave it throughout the day to settle my mind and body

1. The immersive experience of reporting how I feel then having the instructors adjust to it best feature hands down. It feels like I have a personal coach. 
2. The Design is clean and not many distractions which is why I prefer it to Calm. One coach multiple options.
3. Walking meditation, procrastination meditation, so many body scans which I love. Who new 10 mins could be so life changing. 
4. The educational part isn‚Äôt overwhelming. It comes in bite sizes over time. I appreciate the questions along the way that show me I‚Äôm learning. 
5. There‚Äôs a feature showing how many hours I‚Äôve done total and it checks off how many days I‚Äôve been consistent(streak). I could go on but I‚Äôll stop there. 

I‚Äôve shared it with everyone I know who would value it. I just want to thank you the creators. This app is really impacting my life in the best way and I couldn‚Äôt be more grateful. Well I might be, every new meditation I try I appreciate the app more. 

Did I mention the walking meditation is a game changer. Thought I was present on my walks until I was shown a better way using this app. I‚Äôm looking forward to walking way more now.
title: Amazing App Definitely Download

review:
I never gave meditation techniques a fair try until my personal and professional life recently turned into a mess. Now, I‚Äôll swear by it. Within the first 4-5 lessons and with some self awareness, I have seen my anxiety and stress levels drop significantly, even into the next day during my commute to work. I suffer from racing thoughts at night and have a horrible time falling asleep due to chronic back issues, but the Balance app has helped me drift into a deep sleep with ease. I find myself going to bed earlier and looking forward to the next days‚Äô lesson. There‚Äôs also a lot to explore pat sleep and anxiety. I just started another lesson to work through some past trauma. The app also builds your programs and sessions based on the feedback you give it. 

And for the record, I don‚Äôt get paid for reviews. This app seriously has had a very positive impact on my life, and in no time at all. Highly recommend.
title: From disbelief to a strong advocate for meditation

review: I got this app upon finding a social media ad that said the app was free for the first YEAR. Yeah you heard that right. 1 YEAR! After the 1 year it‚Äôs $50. Obviously I was skeptical because as with many trials you think the company‚Äôs just hoping you‚Äôll do it for a few days and then forget about it and in the end paying for a full cycle accidentally. Well I‚Äôm here to say that the app is AWESOME and for a little more than $4 a month I plan on keeping the app after the year and this is only after 4 days. All the meditations offered is perfect for ANYBODY! Kids, older people, younger people, professionals, ANYBODY! The quickest meditation is 3 minutes and I believe goes up to 10 minutes on some. I find the questions asked on some meditations before and/or after a meditation makes it more like a ‚ÄòChoose Your Own Meditation‚Äô adventure. With just a few minutes everyday this app blows every other app for meditation out of the water. Don‚Äôt hesitate! Take the 1 year trial before it‚Äôs gone!
title: 1 Year Trial?!

review: only been using it for a week now, but let me say haha I‚Äôm feeling great! This app really works on a lot of things mentally, it can either be work stress or say you wanna meditate on the go? No problem! You can walk while meditating, which if your like me with Cardiophobia than this will be the best app for you trust me! also if you have a interest in ASMR like me who loves it, then the night time section really works great! we‚Äôll actually I must say all the selections do! Also the loving souls that narrate everything are amazing at there jobs, they sound amazing! and so far there‚Äôs only two as of what I‚Äôve seen, but they feel all my ASMR satisfactory needs lol seriously though you must listen to them! Plus you just feel warm, welcomed, and best of all you feel loved by these amazing people! And what‚Äôs amazing about this app is they truly care for your mental health because what‚Äôs better than 1 year free? Nothing.
title: Best app for meditation by far‚Ä¶

review: I love Balance Meditation/Mindfulness app. I have done 46.5 hours so far. Never have I actually need able to turn off my overactive brain. Not during sleep or yoga or self-meditation. Balance allows me to follow simple instructions & relax when for 49 years on this planet I had not relaxed my brain. Not even as a small child from what I have been told. Ofasu‚Äôs guided relaxations & meditations and progressive relaxation finally connected with me 46 hours ago. I just completed the ‚Äúrelax‚Äù meditation in which I was able to calm my brain for 10 minutes despite my new chronic pain. Thank goodness I found Balance. My brain & my partner appreciate me finding a way to relax finally. Will do the sleep 1 hour meditation when we get where we are adventuring to tonight as I try to run away from my medical issues & get second opinions. At least my brain can be quieted for 10 minutes. Highly recommend Balance.
title: Never turns my brain off before fully

review: This app is amazing. I‚Äôve been using it for two years now, and it is truly set up just for you you. It will ask you questions and personalize it just for you starting you with a specific plan to help you meet the goals that you said in the beginning with the questions It has many 10 day plans that guide you through help with relaxation for example, it teaches you how to meditate,.has two different voices that you can choose from and mini singles if you want to just meditate for a mid day break, a wake up single just to name a few. It has also added a meditation for how is your day went  and you can choose different meditations to go with a great day or and average day etc. I just can‚Äôt say enough about this app.  It is truly an amazing app that is so personalized just for you. It had truly helped my mind and my body and my stress levels and helps me have mindfulness every single day.
title: I Love This Mediation App!

review: I enjoy this app much more than I expected to. I have always stayed away from meditation because I can never turn my brain off and I figured I wouldn‚Äôt be able to do it well, but this app has really changed that for me. Ofosu‚Äôs voice is so calming, he really helps me to focus on the meditation and I actually look forward to doing it everyday. And the sleep modules are amazing! I have sound machines that I stopped using because the sounds were not good quality, but the choices in this app are stellar. If I had one complaint it would be I wish there were a few more time options on the sleep modules. There‚Äôs nothing between 3 hours & 8 hours. 8 hours is a little too long, but I‚Äôd like to play it a little longer than 3 hours to see if I can extend my deep sleep (the deep sleep module is my absolute fav!). If you guys could make more time options available, this app would be 10 stars!
title: Love this App!

review: I‚Äôve been wanting to learn how to meditate for some time. I‚Äôve tried Calm and Headspace. Calm is more about soothing than meditation. Appropriate for my kid. Headspace was ok but the narrative voice has the accent of Ricky Gervais and the British accent feels too hoity toity. Balance has an option of male or female voice, and i prefer the generic ‚ÄúAmerican‚Äù accent. The singles are great, but where I‚Äôve found real value is in the Plans. I‚Äôve moved thru beginner plans and foundations into intermediate and advanced meditation over the course of a year. I don‚Äôt do it every day, but that‚Äôs my goal. And now I‚Äôm learning how to do self-guided meditations. My goal is generally to clear my mind, reduce the noise in my head, create space for intuition. But there are meditations available for all kinds of purposes (like anxiety, concentration, sleep, sadness, anger, and a whole lot more). It‚Äôs been great, so I committed to a lifetime membership!
title: Great intro to meditation, now building up my personal practice

review: I‚Äôve been using this app for about 2 months now and my sleep has been better than ever. Was having a lot issues going to sleep due to high anxiety and panic attacks and this app has helped me so much it is now part of my daily routine to meditate every night with Balance. Since using the subscription version, I have begun to branch out to other meditation lessons as well. I love how personalized this app is and how it feels like I‚Äôm meditating with someone who actually knows me. I‚Äôve never signed up for a paid version of any app before in my life, so I really feel like this app is worth it. Even if you are not going through a stressful time and just looking for overall well-being, I still recommend it. The only ‚Äúcriticism‚Äù I would have is that I prefer the Ofosu voice to the Leah voice and that is not an option for all the single meditations. I would also be interested to see either a single or a meditation plan for burnout recovery.
title: Best app for sleep/anxiety

review: Because of the pandemic, Balance gave out free subscription for their app. So I tried it because I can always just cancel and delete the app if it‚Äôs not good. And ohhh my gosh! I‚Äôm so happy I have this app a chance! Even if there was only a one week trial, I‚Äôm 100 PERCENT sure that I would pay money to keep this app! It‚Äôs honestly helpful, and has been helping me build a better sleep routine. This is my first time meditating, and my psychologist recommended me to try it, and I thought it‚Äôd be crazy hard (it is) but this app is so relaxing, it‚Äôs just hard NOT to do it. For the past few days, the moment I go to my room, I turn off all the lights and set this app up. Again, try it before you knock it! Thank you for creating this app! Also, I love the educational part of the app before going into meditating. I also love the permission to teach or asking if I‚Äôm interested in learning about the information before sharing it to me. This app is great!
title: Definitely worth the money!

review:
This is definitely the best personalized meditation app. After trying at least 6 meditation app (like Headspace, Aura, 10% happier, my life, smiling mind), I can say that Balance is the only one that really tracks your improvement in specific skills or meditation techniques. These techniques are introduced to you sequentially and very gradually, so it really helps you to learn them.
The personalization of the sessions is at another level. With the other apps they typically check with you how you‚Äôre feeling and keep track of this in some sort of journal, but Balance uses that information, plus additional more specific information related to how comfortable you‚Äôre feeling with the new techniques, your level for each skill, among others, to create truly personalized sessions. This really helps you to grow in the different meditation techniques. 

Another difference between Balance and other meditation apps, is that Balance offers quality over quantity. The other apps have literally hundreds of sessions that may overwhelm you if you are a novice at meditation. With Balance, you have a good number of programs and individual sessions that are really good in terms of quality.

The last good thing about this app is the price. It definitely has the best pricing if you think about the quality of the product.
I totally recommend it!!
title: Truly personalized meditation

review: This meditation app is really a great quality tool to improve your basic meditation practice. It‚Äôs very simple yet efficient in teaching you techniques without being overly showy. The voices are soothing - I especially enjoy Ofosu. I really like how easy the flow of these meditations are & enjoy that each new track asks questions to build your personalized meditation based on your level of skill & familiarity with the methods being taught. This isn‚Äôt available in any other meditation app I‚Äôve tried so far. I docked off one star because I went through the whole advanced series pretty quick. It dropped off at meditating for ten minutes in complete silence which was so amazing. I so wanted it to continue so I could build more on that skill but it finished there. Please bring more levels to advanced users!! Thank you for this app- it‚Äôs great for anyone interested in learning meditation as it‚Äôs super user friendly, to the point, & helps you implement valuable meditative tools to help you in your daily life.
title: Quality meditation app

review: I really enjoy this app. However I was disappointed when I unlocked the year of it and it seems I still can‚Äôt adjust my sessions to be any longer than 10 minutes. 5 or 10 minutes are the only options. Is this going to change? Usually I‚Äôm just getting settled and my mind is only just staring to quiet as she‚Äôs asking me to open my eyes. Also when she asks to count your breaths up to 5 and start over, I rarely get to 5 counts before she‚Äôs on to the next exercise. I‚Äôd really like to see this app offer 15 or 20 minute sessions with more time in between each of the prompts. Otherwise I‚Äôm wondering if I can get a refund because 10 minutes just isn‚Äôt enough for me. The app is great otherwise, I love that it‚Äôs personalized and tracks your skills and how long you‚Äôve done each of them but I find I meditate much more deeply after 10 minutes of getting my mind to settle down first.
title: Great app but the sessions go by too quickly

review: i‚Äôm not one to ever review an app. i‚Äôm not sure i ever have but this one deserves it all. i have a hard time sleeping and other apps never really helped, they just made my mind wander even more. Ofosu‚Äôs voice is so soothing and something about the sleep meditations put me right to bed and i‚Äôve been in very deep sleeps. as someone who is prone to nightmares i‚Äôve noticed that i haven‚Äôt experienced any since falling asleep. i feel truly cared for and the 1 year free subscription is amazing. i‚Äôm not off limits to anything and i can use whatever resources i can find on there which is incredible. when my year is up i will for sure start to pay for it and that‚Äôs also something i‚Äôve never done. i truly truly think this app is incredible and suggest it to anyone wanting to mediate, relax, de-stress, sleep better, have a clearer mind.. etc. truly the best app on my phone
title: i would recommend this app to EVERYONE.

review:
I‚Äôll say right from the get go, I don‚Äôt leave reviews unless I‚Äôm highly satisfied or dissatisfied. I‚Äôve been dabbling in meditation recently, practicing a few times by myself without guidance and did ‚Äúok‚Äù but never achieved any real sense of mindfulness. I‚Äôve also tried other apps that did not offer what I needed or was looking for. 
So, I decided to download this app. I personally thought the price was steep but the 1 FREE YEAR subscription before you buy was what sold me. So far, it‚Äôs worth the money I‚Äôll be spending. There any so many things it offers! 
I used to have a nature sounds radio I‚Äôd play as a kid to help me sleep. This app has those sounds! Ocean, forest, stream, etc. Meditation is very involved. They have foundations they teach you, and help with. And offer the guidance voice in multiple voices depending on your preference! 
So to say the least, I‚Äôm very happy. Thanks Balance!!
title: Highly Recommended

review: Conceptually this app is great, but it is not right for everyone. I have been out of my meditation practice for years, so thought it would be best to start as a beginner again. I only did three days before deleting this app. Each day was breath focused, which is not great for certain types of anxiety and PTSD. In fact focusing on breathing can cause a panic attack to happen. (It has happened to me) The meditations were some of the worst I‚Äôve experienced, they were poorly done and left me feeling worse each time. I initially downloaded this after a physician suggested I get back into meditation. This is not right for me. Each day the teacher would say something along the lines of ‚Äòyou will always be able to breathe so just breathe‚Äô... I have a neurological disease that causes me to stop breathing, and I have been put in the ICU for it... that statement being repeated over and over, was awful!!! I hope that others find benefits from this app, but if you have any serious issues with trauma, anxiety or a breathing problem this might not be right for you. I wish I had known. I will keep looking.
title: Not for everyone

If you'd like to share more about how Balance might be able to improve we welcome your suggestions. Please reach out to support@elevateapp.com. ", 'modified': '2019-12-31T16:55:03Z'}

review:
I signed up for the free year, and it was a slow start but I finally started meditating regularly and really noticed my improved mindfulness and mood in life. Then my trial ended. I figured I‚Äôd learned the techniques, I knew the exercises and mindfulness so why bother with the app anymore? 

From time to time I would try other guided meditations and free trials. None of them got me invested in meditation like Balance. None of them felt like a ‚Äòpractice‚Äô, they didn‚Äôt feel like mentors or guides. The meditations were just breathing exercises, not lessons and teachings like Balance.

I came back to Balance and now I‚Äôm excited about my practice again. Other apps and services felt like they had 50 teachers all giving their own ‚Äúintro to meditation‚Äù practice. Balance feels like 1 mentor who guides you and teaches you as you grow in your practice.
title: The only meditation app that feels like a mentor guiding me

review: The Balance app is the only thing I‚Äôve found that has made me WANT to create a meditation practice. I am now on a 77-day streak (the app keeps track), and it feels glorious! I love the variety - that there are not just breath-based meditations, but visualizations, gratitude meditations, multi-sensory check-ins, and even interactive experiences. I started with a 5-minute practice and have now moved up to 10 minutes, with the new Daily meditations that are catered to how you are feeling! And not only does the practice help me to de-stress in the moment, but I can feel that after time, as this becomes a habit, my emotional resilience is strengthening. I am more able to bounce back from a difficult encounter or event, instead of letting it cloud over my whole outlook for a day or many days. I am a huge believer in the benefits of a meditation practice now:). Thank you, Balance!
title: This has made my life better.

review: This app has absolutely changed my life. I always believed that I was ‚Äúbad at meditating‚Äù and that I would never experience the benefits of mindfulness. But Balance makes meditating completely and totally accessible for ANYONE. They really build the meditation foundations from the ground up and cater everything to your preferences. For real, they have meditations for every mood on this app. Meditation has completely changed my outlook on life and has helped me manage the difficult times in ways I never thought were possible. I‚Äôve meditated every day for over 750 days now and it‚Äôs all thanks to Balance. Both Leah and Ofosu are incredible guides and the whole Balance team is responsive, supportive, and helpful. This app is a must have if you are looking to make meditation a part of your daily life and you don‚Äôt know where to start. Thank you, Balance! ‚ô•Ô∏è
title: Life-Changing!

review: I've tried many of the other apps, I'm a huge fan of Jon Kabat-Zinn and have done many of his guided meditations before "apps" even existed.  I've been out of practice for a few years and found the Balance app and am only a few days in, but man, this blows everything else away.  Well worth every penny, and even though I'm trying it for free right now.  I'm so thankful for the offer to do so because I might not have given it a chance having been disappointed by other meditation apps in the past.  I haven't listened to Leah's meditations yet (it gives you choices when you start), but I highly recommend Ofosu as his voice is the epitome of graceful guidance.  If I could give the rating more stars, I would.  Thank you, Balance for helping me pick up and stick with my mediation practice after so many false starts over the past few years!
title: Wow!!

review: My sister got me this app as a gift during one of the mentally, hardest times of my life. I committed to it in desperation to help myself get better. I can not stress the positive change that this app introduced into my life. I had mediated before and used other meditation apps but Balance is so calming supportive and was most importantly the right app for me. It may not be the right app for you but give it a try you never know. Mediation with Ofosu has taught me things that I use in my everyday life and I know it helped me get through some of the traumas I had yet to face when I first picked up this app. Mediating has literally changed my brain chemistry and i‚Äôm so grateful for all I now know that I can use to help me stay not only strong during my struggles but find things to be happy about too. I‚Äôm so beyond grateful for this app. Thank you Ofosu and thank you Balance!
title: God Bless Ofosu

review: i‚Äôm going to start off this review by saying that i am a generally stressed person. school, work, personal life, presentations, etc. so you can imagine once i heard of meditating, i was going to find an app that could truly help me. balance is by far the best one i‚Äôve used. it is free, and though it does have a premium feature that requires payment, i feel like you have a good selection of things to choose from regardless. the app itself is very organized and calming. i‚Äôve been meditating with the app for about a week now, right before bed, and it‚Äôs been amazing. it really does help me get into a calmer state and slows my heart rate down. the voices are very calming, and i like how they have plans to teach about meditating techniques and tips and tricks that could help. i used to have headspace, simple habit, and calm, but i have deleted them in lieu of balance!! you won‚Äôt regret getting this app!
title: Meditation Magic ü§©

review: The one year free trial is so generous and sweet! It makes me really feel like the creators care about wellness and aren‚Äôt money hungry like a lot of wellness items/services tend to feel. The app itself is so calming I like the voice of the guide. I also like how it adapts to your goals and mood for each day, giving you a different but still relevant mediation each day. I use it morning and night to help me wake up and fall asleep and even sometimes throughout the day. This mediation app is much better than headspace! Headspace has become an app that you can‚Äôt do anything AT ALL without a subscription, you can download it for free but can‚Äôt access any of the meditations, balance isn‚Äôt like that. Besides the price, it‚Äôs an over cuter interface and design! I actually look forward to mediation each day
title: The best meditation app I‚Äôve used!! (Much better than headspace)

review:
This app is so close to being my go-to source for guided meditations. Everything feels so good and responds to feedback intelligently. I‚Äôve even been able to do longer meditations and feel like they‚Äôre only a free minutes with the pacing. Really incredible!

However, I‚Äôm upset that there isn‚Äôt an option to check with how you feel and create a meditation from that. The plans are great, especially the beginner and advanced series, but sometimes you don‚Äôt want ten days of relaxation in a row. The competitor app I stick with focuses on how you feel physically, mentally, and emotionally to recommend a meditation and then check in again afterwards. An approach like this, with questions about how certain techniques felt and such, would put Balance above the rest.

A great app, wonderful for learning how to meditate and expanding your skills, but not yet perfect.
title: Almost Perfect

review: Hands down best app I‚Äôve tried! I‚Äôve tried them all, but none like Balance. First off, they give you a one year free trial. Which is very generous of them. No other meditation app has that. Second, the app has all sorts of categories for what you are trying to target. For beginners they have a foundations plan that teaches you how meditation works. After every meditation they have you rate it and then the app tailors it based on your needs. For example, if you like more or less talking in in the sessions? body scan or breath focus? Before every meditation they give you useful information regarding how it is beneficial. It also gives you  a simple 3 question quiz to see if you retained the information they teach you. This has improved my life and when the trail ends, I am definitely starting my subscription. For those of you reading it is definitely worth a try.
title: I love this app

review: I have tried a lot of mediation and  mindfulness apps over the past few years and I never seen to be able to stick with any of them. Balance is different then most and is wonderful to use. You can customize the times and voices, it adjusts meditations  based on your needs and progress, and it is very patient and understanding that mindfulness is often a struggle for many. Also, the singles like Relax, Focus, etc. are very useful. One of the best parts of the app are the sleep and nap portions! When I can‚Äôt sleep this app is actually the only thing that I have found that can lull me into a slumber. And the nap portion is incredible - it gently guides you into dozing off and then plays the most wonderful, peaceful sound when it‚Äôs time to wake up. I have never really attempted or enjoyed naps until I found this app!
title: Best meditation/mindfulness app I have ever used

review:
So- I have PTSD after my time in the military. I go through awful bouts of insomnia. 
I downloaded this app last night and it literally came up asking me if I was trying to sleep RIGHT NOW. I clicked yes and it took me into a already ready relaxation meditation thingie. (If you can‚Äôt tell, I don‚Äôt know much about meditation lol) I was ASLEEP BEFORE THE RECORDING EVEN ENDED and I slept through the night. 
I haven‚Äôt looked at the rest of the app at all, but it gets five stars from me for the fact it got me to sleep so quickly. 
 I downloaded a bunch of different meditation apps last night in my desperation, and this was the only one that offered what I was looking for for free without having to make an account. I only wish I hadn‚Äôt spent an hour going through the other apps only to realize I‚Äôd need to sign up and pay money.
title: Insomnia help

review:
So life is hard for almost all of us to a certain extent. We all have more worries than not. Bills and such. Even if we can manage everything. Sometimes we have the weight of the world on our shoulders. I know I feel that way a lot of the time. So I worry and my anxiety tends to take over. I need some help and I think I have found it in this app. Sometimes, the simple things are what helps us through. Meditation has always sounded interesting to me but never actually tried. Until now. And I have to say it helps calm me. Mainly because we have to program ourselves to think a certain way and balance our minds with training our minds with daily reminders that this app does. I‚Äôm new here but I think I will stay. I feel better already. Hope you all feel better as well. 

God bless.
title: It‚Äôs actually helps!

review: At the beginning I was a bit skeptical, ‚Äúhow can you make specifically personalized plans?‚Äú With the first few you could definitely tell that they were mixed clips because there wasn‚Äôt as much feedback you have them. Now it‚Äôs so seamless I don‚Äôt even think twice about it. This is the most effective app I have ever used with meditation and would highly recommend it to anyone beginning their mindfulness journey. The whole program feels like it was specifically made for you and you only. Just the small things of doing a single for the first time and the app acknowledging it and with later listens going a bit deeper. I was lucky and was able to snag the year free trial of the premium version and it does not disappoint. Thank you to the entire team that made this app possible, you have truly changed my life for the better!
title: Absolutely phenomenal

review: This app has truly impressed me since I work in product, and have attempted to create mindfulness/ meditation apps like this one. In the last couple of years I‚Äôve read a bunch of books on mindfulness for personal reasons, and though I truly believe in the concept, it has still been a challenge to put in to action, especially meditation. I‚Äôve always wanted to meditate, but I made excuses that I didn‚Äôt have time. With this app tho, the meditation practices are truly amazing and it has made me want to come back to this app. But at the end of the day, we are all responsible for taking the first action to meditate! Stop making excuses that you‚Äôre too busy bc you have 3 minutes to spare. Just try it when you‚Äôre drinking coffee or having breakfast. And this app would do the rest :)
title: Exceeded my expectations

review:
Balance is an amazing app. I am on an 11 day streak after first downloading and signing up for the free trial. It‚Äôs helped me immensely. I suffer from a panic disorder, major depressive disorder and PTSD. Balance gives me something to really look forward to before bed. It helps me feel clearer headed and calmer. I‚Äôve tried meditation before and it‚Äôs never stuck. I will be getting a lifetime subscription as soon as I am able to financially. 
There‚Äôs so much that‚Äôs great about the app from the instructors. I choose to learn from Leah who has the serene voice of an angel. The sleep meditation helps me a lot as well. I recommend doing the 10 minute versions daily for each one of your sessions. 
I‚Äôm deeply grateful this app exists and it helps me more than I can put into words. It‚Äôs really good stuff. Thank you and Namo Amituofo!
title: Helps immensely

review:
I really like this app, it‚Äôs made getting into meditation way easier for me especially with their guided plans and daily check ins. 
My only qualms with the app is that for the daily check in, for whatever you‚Äôre feeling, like for me I was feeling unmotivated a few days in a row and was doing that meditation that was played if you clicked on that feeling but it‚Äôs the same meditation every time. I just wish it was something different because I just ended up exiting out of it and picking another feeling to get a different meditation. Another thing is I wish there were more meditations on visualization. Since I know several studies have shown that visualization is almost just as powerful as doing the thing you‚Äôre visualizing. Those are the only 2 things other than that amazing app and I only just started but it‚Äôs helped me a lot!
title: Good app

review:
there are times where the narrator takes 45 seconds to simply explain a basic concept, and other times where they ask a ton of questions to try and understand where i‚Äôm at. id rather have an
option to select i‚Äôm a beginner/intermediate and have some direction, but not 45 seconds of explaining what the definition of gratitude is. after receiving the definition, the dude just kept saying relax and barely talked for 3-4 minutes, i got so bored and couldn‚Äôt relax because nothing was happening, why wasn‚Äôt he leading me towards gratitude?? some sessions work great but others are a complete waste of time and makes it hard to want to do it daily. i‚Äôll probably start working towards doing on my own or finding a content creator that does a better job and is more focused on what i want. 3/5 and i definitely wouldn‚Äôt pay for the subscription had it not been free for a year

review: I‚Äôve tried clam and other apps but this finally gave me the opportunity to try the paid version of meditation apps for the first time and I love it!
