title: Has helped me a lot and also one recommendation

review: Let‚Äôs start off by saying I am a skeptic, period! It‚Äôs hard to believe that something that looks goods, acts good, and really is good, is good, you know! Honestly this is one of the best apps I have ever came across. I don‚Äôt believe things just happen by coincidence. Nope! I believe everything is designed by God. I call them divine appointments, I can not remember what I was doing to encounter this app but it has truly been a life changer for me. I tell everyone I know about this and I share it with as many people as I can because it‚Äôs truly a good app. No, a great app! Thank you to everyone who has participated in the process of making this great app; from idea to conception! May you all be blessed a thousand time and more! To the glory of God, may it enhance everyone who comes in contact with the app or it‚Äôs users!
title: A true skeptic!

review: I‚Äôve never written a review for an app. So when I tell you to download this meditation app and try it I mean it. I‚Äôve tried all the main meditation apps and some that aren‚Äôt that known. This one is the best bc of how personalized it becomes to you. You go through a series of questions when you first make an account to personalize what you learn and what you want to focus on. And then as you continue to do more meditations and answer more questions it gets even more personal. There aren‚Äôt as many meditations on here as other bigger apps yet but I don‚Äôt mind because the ones I have found on here have been more helpful than any other meditation sessions on any other app. The before sleep ones on the sleep page are amazing! I think I will be a lifelong subscriber.
title: Best Meditation App Ever

review: Between last Saturday and Thursday, I got about 10 hours of sleep ‚Ä¶. Maybe 14 if you add up all the little minutes of sessions too‚Ä¶ I was miserable. Struggling with anxiety and life stuff adding to that, I can‚Äôt get my brain to shut off.  Saw an ad on Instagram for Balance with the free use for a year and decided to give it a try. Nothing else seems to be working and I feel like the lack of sleep was just making everything worse‚Ä¶ so why not? Day one, I got 8.75 hours of sleep. Day two, 7.5, and last night I got almost 7 (but it was my own fault for staying up too late).  I know I downloaded it mostly for anxiety and while the daily meditations are not super interesting right now to me as I need to first get better sleep, better sleep is happening thanks to this app.
title: Best sleep ever

review:
I have been using the app daily and I really love everything about it! There are plenty of choices but it's not overwhelming, and I really love how they include useful information to actually develop skills within the meditations! For example, in the sleep course they "teach" you how to sleep, and it is filled with relevant scientific data.

My only issue is that for some reason it does not sync well with Apple Health. The syncing is delayed and it often skips many days. This is frustrating to me because every other meditation app I've used exported the data perfectly to Apple Health, so it almost makes me want to use other apps just because of this one thing. I would really appreciate it if they fixed this because everything else about the app is so great.
title: Almost perfect!

review: I have been a skeptic in the past but I was bored while in rehab and decided to give this a try. With 3 minutes a day gradually making a noticeable difference, I decided to add different and longer meditations. I just got done with my second 10 minute session and I can honestly say if I knew meditation could be like this, I would have never got into drugs. This is like euphoric as pain meds and more relaxing than Xanax. This is also a great way to get to know yourself. It‚Äôs made me love myself and now I feel just fine being alone. It‚Äôs helped my mood, depression, anxiety, and PTSD. It‚Äôs free for an entire YEAR. Do yourself the best favor you can possibly do for yourself and change your life! If it‚Äôs already a great life then make it even better!
title: It‚Äôs like meeting yourself for the first time!

review: Immaculate. One of the first times I've sought to write a review rather than receiving a constant pop up to do so. I've been meditating on and off for 14 years, and I've found it a struggle to maintain a routine this past year. The personalization, instructors, gamification, and guidance have really made every day's meditation easy and enjoyable. I may choose to do my own meditations on top of the ones offered here, but they've helped me establish a daily habit I look forward to and expanded my horizons/knowledge beyond what I've learned in my personal practice. The reason for supplementing would be to have more quiet time rather than being guided (the app offers this as well, though you don't really need an app to guide you in silence). Perfectly designed tracks for building a meditation habit into your life and seeing tangible benefits.
title: Immaculate App

review: I deal with anxiety and feeling scared of many scenarios that happen in my head. And I‚Äôve been pushing back for a long time getting treatment to deal with these issues since I‚Äôm scared of being judged. But I felt as if I needed to take responsibility of my actions since they were starting to deeply affect my personal life and relationships with people I held dear to me. And I saw this on Instagram and decided to try it out since it is a year trial for free and I wanted to at least try it and the starting meditation really helped to calm me and when I felt my anxiety rise from the scenarios playing in my head I found an audio to help deal with that. This has made me feel calm and level headed. Thank you for everything you all have done for people that struggle with mental health issues.
title: Helps with anxiety

review:
I‚Äôm only on day one. And even tho I have 1 free year, I‚Äôve already bought the lifetime membership. This is the most amazing meditation app I have EVER encountered. I have the worst anxiety I‚Äôve ever seen. Panic attacks to no end and suffering from anxiety from my current medications that raise my anxiety even more. And the ‚Äúsingles‚Äù in the app couldn‚Äôt be any more help than I could possibly ask for. They help you get through anything you can think of.
Also to note, I‚Äôve never been one to be a meditating type, but this is beyond belief that this app can help in such a way to eliminate my panic attacks so quickly.
And no I‚Äôm not paid, although I wouldn‚Äôt not accept it if it came about ;)

Seriously, don‚Äôt hesitate to try the free year, you will love it within days.
title: Anxiety Elimination; One of the Best Apps Ever.

review: I came across this app on a whim through an Instagram ad that offered a really good deal for the first year, so I figured ‚Äúwhy not?‚Äù. So far, I‚Äôm loving it! I love the male voice who does my guided meditations. I‚Äôm not sure if everyone gets the same voice but this guy deserves a raise. His voice is sooo soothing and calming. There‚Äôs something about it that helps me immediately calm down a bit during my meditations. Honestly, going into this, I thought it would be just another gimmick and it would be impossible to get me to be able to sit still long enough to meditate but it‚Äôs been so easy so far! Every day is different. I learn some minor new fact every day. And I love the layout of each meditation. Highly recommend. Excited to see where the next year takes me.
title: So far so good!

review: Balance was extremely attractive to me from the get-go. From the simplistic and easy-to-follow design to the specification aspect to the user. With each day, they‚Äôre asking simple questions, collecting data, and using your responses to fine-tune your meditation for the day. In a strange way, you feel cared for! I like that you can choose: the voice, and the length of time. Most days, I have just 5 min, and it‚Äôs been so easy to jump into that. 10 min for days when I can allow it and need it. I also found the Single one-off meditations very enjoyable. There‚Äôs more unique ones such as: Creativity/Innovation and ones for Couples. I loved doing the Couples one with my husband. All in all, the best meditation app I‚Äôve tried yet (and I‚Äôve tried quite a bit). Thanks, Balance! Keep up the good work!
title: Finally, a Meditation App that Sticks!

review:
I absolutely love this app. It has really helped ease my anxiety and helped me relax and fall asleep at night. There are tons of options and I‚Äôve loved all the ones I‚Äôve tried. I have a very difficult time falling asleep- I cannot shut my brain off and every little noise wakes me up- however I have fallen asleep during the sleep meditations! That‚Äôs unheard of for me. I highly recommend this app! 

My ONLY criticism is that I cannot control this from my Apple Watch which is frustrating for me. I‚Äôd also love to set up a playlist of sorts because sometimes I like listening to multiple sessions before I sleep and I don‚Äôt like having to break from my relaxed state to go to my phone and find the next one I want- it‚Äôd be nice to queue it up. ü§ûüèºü§ûüèº
title: Amazing but PLEASE add Apple Watch integration

review:
I‚Äôve been told that I would benefit from meditation for years but I didn‚Äôt think I would ever be able to sit still and calm my mind. 

I started my free annual trial 3 days ago. I have made myself take the time each morning and throughout the day to participate in the various meditations that are offered in the app. I have been amazed that I have actually been able to relax and calm down with these meditations. I‚Äôm noticing less mind wondering and increased focus. 

We are so fast to help others while ignoring our own needs. I am so thankful for this annual trial membership. I hope that others are able to get the benefits that I have discovered these last few days and I look forward to continuing to set aside time for myself daily.
title: I can already tell a difference

review: I never write reviews for apps but this one is an exception. During this quarantine, I‚Äôve made it my goal to better myself and my mental health. After trying a few other meditation apps, I found Balance to be the best. They have numerous plans available to fit your needs and they track your progress. After completing Foundations 1, I was hesitant to purchase a subscription to continue. After a month, I decided it is worth paying to continue practicing my meditation and mindfulness. Meditation is a slow process and I urge you to be patient. I am current on Foundations 5 and a few other plans and I have noticed a significant change in my daily life including my mood and interactions. Thank you Ofosu and Leah, this is hands down the best app and purchase I‚Äôve made.
title: Best meditation app

review: Even though I know these two apps aren‚Äôt affiliated, Headspace was my go-to meditation app for a LONG time (2 years) for when I first started my meditative journey. Now that Balance has come along, I feel like I have two of the absolute BEST apps helping guide me along this journey. I‚Äôve also been using Elevate which, ironically, I found out was behind Balance AFTER I got the Balance app. Elevate is by far my favorite ‚Äòbrain games‚Äô app though, with Peak right behind it. All in all, a fantastic app. The people in the audios don‚Äôt speak in an overly mystic, weird, distracting kind of way and their advice is always practical, well explained, and easy to instigate. I love this app and can‚Äôt wait to see all the benefits it‚Äôll bring me! Thank you to the people who developed it and everyone who contributed to creating it!
title: My favorite next to Headspace!

review: This is the best meditation app I‚Äôve tried so far. So happy they‚Äôre giving you the first year for free. I would continue to pay for this after my first year because it‚Äôs worth it. As a beginner, it starts you off slow and teaches you the foundation, which I‚Äôve found extremely helpful. The biggest challenge to meditating regularly is finding time. This app is tailored to you and your time and can be as little as 3 minutes each day. I‚Äôve found that it has decreased my level of stress and significantly improved my sleep in as little as 2-3 days. The app also has other meditation programs outside of the daily foundation building. Its sleep meditation works much better than those bed time stories from other apps. I highly recommend this!
title: Love this app

review: I have always been into meditation and in recent years fell out of the habit.  I didn‚Äôt think I had the time in my life anymore.  I saw that this was free for a year so I figured I would give it a try.  This app has successfully launched me back into a regular practice again!  There are so many different options from core practices to teach skills and focused meditation for specific purposes such as stress, creativity and much more.  This app has helped me manage stress, anxiety and severe overthinking. If you have ever considered meditation or struggle with it,  I would high recommend giving this a try.  The only disappointment sometimes is I wish there were more option for less guidance as you progress and what happened to the driving meditation?? Seems it disappeared with the recent update.

review: I‚Äôve used several meditation apps before for years, but Balance is definitely my favorite. One of the main reasons why is that the meditations change based on your input, meaning that the narrator remembers your previous experiences and takes into account your ongoing preferences, needs, and challenges. Some meditations change a tiny bit every time you use them, like the morning wake up meditation. Another awesome feature it that each meditation tells you what skills you‚Äôre practicing before and after you do them. Ofosu‚Äôs voice is also really great. This meditation app for me is my favorite, but you also don‚Äôt have to choose just one. Balance can be a great compliment to other apps like Headspace, Ten Percent Happier, and Insight Timer.
title: Best Meditation App

review:
I‚Äôve tried to have a consistent meditation practice for years (20) and tried many good apps since apps became a thing. Not until Balance have I had a consistent practice that has spanned months. I have made so much progress in consistency and the ability to sit. I went ahead and bought a lifetime membership well before my trial year was over. I just love the way the app caters to me. I‚Äôve shared it with everyone I know!
My one complaint is that there are not more longer sits. The advanced plans have longer sits but the singles are all relatively short. I hope that they will add some 20-30 minute singles as well as more eyes open meditations as I found that tough but extremely helpful with ADD. Alll said, thanks for the app. You are doing a real service to the world!
title: ADD Mind

review:
I saw on Instagram that they had a deal for a year free and of course I hoped on it because meditation has become a very important part of my life. This app helps me calm down and stay relaxed so much. I begin to realize that when I go without meditation my brain becomes very cloudy and I forget to take care of myself. But when I do
meditate, it helps me stay clear and go forth with the day. It brings in the positive reinforcements to the negative thoughts that can sometimes take over every bit of my mind. Also it‚Äôs only 5 minutes! You can change it to make it longer, but I really love that it quick and easy so I can have my time in the morning and then go forth and be great! This is the only app I‚Äôve ever reviewed so you know it‚Äôs good.
title: A really awesome meditation app!

review:
I had to move suddenly back in Italy, I needed some sort of support to cope with some major family matters. I gave a try to this app because the year long trial. Further getting to know the mission of the funders, it really warmth my heart. I thought maybe the marketing strategy got me, or maybe these people really care about mental health and they work on making it as much accessible as possible.
The grief tool was outstanding.
A few days in the app and I‚Äôm already considering to buy the lifelong membership, I‚Äôm so fascinated by all the help this app offers. The voice of the guide is incredibly calming and the plan is personalized to my needs and my level. Thank you so much, your app made this challenging time of my life not so impossible to bear.
title: If perfection was an app.

review: Balance does exactly that. It balances you for your day or during your day or whenever you need to use it. I got into meditation to calm my nervous system and be able to call back techniques for when I was stressed or activated. This app has so many options for meditations that range from 5mins and up so it‚Äôs great when you just need to center yourself real quick or if you have time you can do longer! The voices they use are soothing that is a must for me if I‚Äôm going into a guided meditation. I found this app by accident and I‚Äôm at the point where I might end up purchasing it. Meditation has become such a valuable part of my life that this is almost necessary, truly everyone could use this!
title: An opportunity for a better you every day!!!

review: I do really enjoy the app and I‚Äôm glad I found it.  I do wish there was a bit more variety within each category- as in as you use a category, new meditations appear.  Example:  morning brew - it‚Äôs the same 5 minute meditation every time I use it.  Same with commute - home or to work.  Essentially the same.  I tried using a different voice and it was the same meditation words just in a different voice. The lack of variety in categories may make it hard for me to eventually stick with - I‚Äôll get bored with the same words. But there are loads of categories and that is a good thing because I do like the fact you can choose situations that fit your needs.  But there needs to be more choices within a category.
title: Great app

review: The only app I turn to every single day.  It‚Äôs taught me how to meditate, go to sleep, return to my intentions instead of wandering off, and helped me find more hope and satisfaction in my life.  Starting a year ago, I have done all the Foundations in the Plan, then the added Plans like Happiness, Productivity, or Gratitude, and then moved on through the Singles.  I use Sleep and The Return to Sleep most nights.  Now I repeat my favorites such as days 7, 8, or 9 in Productivity in the mornings. Usually select 15 minutes Sleep at night, and 5 to 15 minutes in the morning with whatever I want to focus on; it‚Äôs like having a personal coach.  Love having choice of both Leah and Ofuso‚Äôs voices to choose from. I now meditate on my own for a minute or two throughout the day and refresh.  No downsides. Highly recommend.
title: Grateful for this app

review:
I have been using this app for 9 months now, I got it to support my deeper practice using the ‚ÄúCalm‚Äù app. While Calm feels very transcending, Balance is a very particular app that sets it apart from other apps. I know this may sounds odd, but the actual doing of meditation may be a different experience to everyone, particularly when it comes to sitting times with varying times. Balance does just that, it literally teaches you how to ‚Äúdo it‚Äù by breaking down all the ‚Äútypes of meditations‚Äù and fully engaging you in the intention. It is a VER practical muscle builder approach to meditation. 

Now, recent updates have made this app even better! They have added ‚Äúimmersive‚Äù approach to meditations. My personal favorite is the forest immersion. The meditation allows you to visualize yourself in a forest and incorporates sounds cues and vibrations on your phone to support your immersion into the visualization retreat. It is an ABSOLUTELY amazing experience, very deep calming feeling! 

Their sleep meditation are also very engaging, it is not a story per se but rather a technical approach to the easing of the mind and body into sleep mode. 

In general, the app supports any other app like App in building the technique muscle and improve meditation.
title: Recent Updates only made it better!

review:
First, I want to thank you guys for this amazing app. For any feeling, there is a meditation that will make you relax and understand what you are going through. What people want more than that? That‚Äôs all in! But because this app is very important, it reasonable to think about making it in other languages too. Many adults nowadays are depressed and tired, but they don‚Äôt know how to speak english. For example, I wanted to tell someone about this app because I am sure it is going to help him, but he doesn‚Äôt understand English. In my opinion, translating the app to Arabic, Spanish, and Chinese, will cover 80% of the speakers in the world. This will be a huge step forward for the app. Please consider this update, many people need it.
Thank you.
title: Make it in many languages

review:
There is a meditation technique that wasn‚Äôt working for me so I left feedback for the app developers explaining that the ‚Äúcustomization‚Äù wasn‚Äôt allowing me to skip any skill in the pre determined courses. When I emailed and asked how I can i tailor my experience to not include this they told me to skip the ones that have that technique. Also the programs don‚Äôt let you skip. So their response doesn‚Äôt apply to this product. 

You have to follow the pre programmed program. Great. So instead of customization it tells everyone to take do all lessons and do them the same way. Everyone takes the same everything. There is zero customization. You are all paying for the same experience. Nothing is unique, as apposed to what‚Äôs advertised. I‚Äôve sent several emails and they just tell me the same thing which is this is the same way it is for everyone. Very disappointed that there is zero customization to this ‚Äúpersonalized‚Äù meditation app.
title: Not customizable at all. Same for everyone.
developerResponse: {'id': 18599530, 'body': 'Thanks for your feedback. We‚Äôre sorry to hear that our level of personalization in Balance is not what you‚Äôre looking for. If you‚Äôd like to skip a meditation because you are not interested in that day‚Äôs particular skill, you can tap and hold the dot forward or back on the progress line at the bottom of the meditation. If you‚Äôd like to discuss your thoughts more please email us anytime.', 'modified': '2020-10-20T15:52:51Z'}

review:
I have tried 4 or 5 other meditation apps, some free, some I paid for for a month. I‚Äôve only been using this one for a few days but I am very impressed. I received a free trial but I believe my search is over. This app is great and the subscription price is very reasonable compared to others I have tried. ($30/year right now).

Some features I like:

Both the male and female voices are very nice to listen to.

Lots of built in learning about meditation but you can skip it or not as you see fit. It feels really well integrated without getting in the way. As a comparison, the 10% happier app had a 5 minute intro before each of the first few meditations and sometimes that was fine, but sometimes it just got in the way.

Picking goals for your practice and inputting feedback actually seems to change the meditations in a meaningful way. It‚Äôs not just giving lip service to the idea of a personalized plan.

Interface is intuitive (a must).

Most apps just include a timer for unguided meditation, this uses a short, gentle intro and finish for the first and last minute or so. Much better, and so easy! Why didn‚Äôt anyone else think of it before?!

Integrates nicely with Apple health and Siri.
title: Excellent Meditation app. Very well done.

review: I‚Äôve tried a lot of apps like this one, that claim that they improve your mood/sleep/focus etc. none have worked as they make it really difficult to incorporate the apps into your routine. The apps suggest unrealistic recommendations right away and make it hard to commit or see a difference. This app is DIFFERENT! It surveys you and your goals, and it learns from you. It gives realistic and beginner-friendly recommendations and exercises and guides you every step of the way. I‚Äôve only been using the app for a day and it has already made a positive impact on my life and mental wellbeing. The fact that they give you a year for free says a lot about their intentions as well. Great app, 5 stars! PLEASE TRY THIS. I‚Äôll be signing up all of my loved ones.
title: Skeptical at First

review: I cannot say enough good things about this app. It is personalized and brings you through the process of learning to meditate step by step. Even my husband likes it because it has started him off slow and with a lot of guidance. You get so much encouragement. I have learned so much and it is helping me with some difficult situations in ways I could not foresee. The insight I have received through meditation has been invaluable and I wouldn‚Äôt have been able to access it if not for this app. Ofosu is the guide I use and his voice and manner of speaking is just wonderful. (Check out the sleep song!) My hope is that the app will expand its lesson plans and singles because I am using this everyday of my life going forward.
title: Best App for Meditation

review: In the short time I‚Äôve been using this application, I‚Äôve truly come to understand the foundations of meditation as well as it‚Äôs inherit importance. The call to action for at least one meditation session a day has been a great way to keep consistent. The app gives you the freedom to us it‚Äôs features as much as possible or just as needed and I love it! I say this with complete confidence: it‚Äôs been almost a week since I‚Äôve downloaded this app and since using it, I can already feel and see a difference. I‚Äôve taken the lessons and started to tailor my own personal routine to go along side with the meditation exercises the app provides. If you‚Äôre looking for self improvement in the best way possible, balance is a great way to get started ‚ú®
title: Great meditation app!!!

review: I‚Äôm loving this app for so many reasons. Ofosu‚Äôs voice is golden and puts my mind instantly at ease with every meditation. The personalization aspect of this app is truly unique and I haven‚Äôt found this feature in any other meditation or mindfulness app thus far, and I‚Äôve tried just about all of them. The pathways for each category build on one another. Examples of different categories are: Focus, Relaxation, Breathe, Couples, Commute, Sleep, Wind Down, and Concentration. You can pick and choose which one suits you best through the day. I especially enjoy the sleep and relaxation meditations. If you‚Äôre new to meditation or are wanting to expand upon an existing practice, Balance has something for everyone! Try it. You‚Äôll be happy you did!
title: Brilliantly Personalized Curated Sessions

review: I‚Äôve been using the Balance app for a while now, and I must say, it‚Äôs truly the best meditation app I‚Äôve ever come across. The variety of guided meditation sessions is impressive, catering to different needs and levels of expertise. The soothing voices of the instructors coupled with the serene background sounds create an immersive experience that helps me relax and unwind after a hectic day. The app‚Äôs user-friendly interface makes navigation a breeze, and the personalized recommendations are always spot-on. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or an experienced meditator, Balance provides an exceptional range of mindfulness exercises that can fit seamlessly into any schedule. It‚Äôs not just an app; it‚Äôs a companion on my journey to inner peace and mental well-being. Highly recommended!
title: Best meditation app!

review: Let me start by saying I was skeptical of this app, most mediation ones that I‚Äôve downloaded either don‚Äôt work or you can only use them for 2 days before needing to pay a subscription. This one is different, in every way. I‚Äôve been having issues sleeping for weeks now and when I do lay down to sleep it takes me 30min at the very least. With this app I use the sleeping section (with ofosu‚Äôs voice) and the man doing the sleep meditation is so good, his voice is very relaxing I love it. I find myself falling asleep so fast that when there‚Äôs pauses and he randomly talks I jolt awake surprised that I was even sleep. First app that has ever worked so well at getting me to bed at a decent interval, will continue to be a devoted user as long as ofosu is employed!
title: Top 20 in health for a reason, worth the download

review:
I‚Äôve been doing meditation for several months now and have switched between different meditation apps. I was intrigued to try this because it was free for 1 year. 
Overall, I‚Äôm happy with it. It teaches you different techniques and based off of your ratings after each meditation, it customises your plan. 
This app is very directed and focused plan-wise. Other apps are kind of all over the place. For beginners and intermediates, this is great. 
What I would suggest: 1. Make the app available on the iPad iOS, and 2. Make it cheaper than $69/year (I can justify $50 per year, especially that now the leading meditation app reduced it‚Äôs yearly pricing to something like $40). 
Overall, it‚Äôs pretty good and thanks for the introductory offer!
title: Great for beginners and intermediates!

review:
I genuinely am not exaggerating when I say that Balance has changed my life for the better. I have so many health issues and when I first downloaded Balance it was in a frantic search for anything that could help with my insomnia. Learning how to slow my breathing, truly relax my body and be able to listen to soothing voices talk me to sleep genuinely has helped so much, it‚Äôs not a cure all but I‚Äôm so thankful for it. 
The creators of the app also have a podcast and social medias that help educate others on holistic healing. Balance and the creators have been what jump started my journey of healing my body and mind holistically. 
There‚Äôs no reason why you shouldn‚Äôt just download the app and try it, I promise you won‚Äôt regret it!!
title: A Must Have For Anyone

review: Overall, this app is really amazing. I‚Äôve been doing just the free balance meditations right now. As someone who has been dabbling in meditation for the past 6 months, I love the personalization. As a graduate student in a health profession this app has helped me immensely to slow down, let emotions and feelings go, and be more mindful. However, the price is just simply out of a college students price range unfortunately. I will probably have to switch to headspace eventually because they offer a significant student discount that cannot be beat. I would love to see Balance compete with this- the college age population is at high-risk for high stress, mental and emotional disorders, and only thinking about due dates and graduation. I really believe this app could significantly help students if the price made It available to all.
title: Such as useful app, but I‚Äôd love to see a student discount.

review:
I‚Äôve been using the app for 3 days now and I‚Äôm really enjoying the meditations. I love that the app asks you how you‚Äôre feeling and provides guided meditations based on your answers. I feel calm and euphoric after each session and I‚Äôve started doing them in the middle of my workday when I‚Äôm feeling stressed or overwhelmed. It‚Äôs helping to refocus my attention. 

The app is free for a year, which is why I chose to try it. Put a reminder in your phone a week before the trial period ends, so you can unsubscribe if you don‚Äôt want to pay the annual subscription fee. Think about where you could be 1 year from now with 5 to 10 minutes of daily guided help. I‚Äôm 3 days in and I‚Äôm considering paying the fee already lol
title: Try it, it‚Äôs free!

review:
I‚Äôm sorry here, but I have never been more irritated using a meditation app before. As someone who has done this for a few years, the instructors won‚Äôt shut up!!! Seriously, it‚Äôs some over the top whispering in my ear that does the polar opposite of make me calm, and when I am trying to meditate, they will not stop talking. I had to take headphones out to even get through the exercise and it still didn‚Äôt help. This may just be a personal critique, but I found myself more stressed from the unneeded constant talking and ridiculous whispering in my ear the entire time when I'm trying to focus on meditation. 

 Update: I have used the app for 2 more weeks now to still give it a shot, nothing has changed. The instructors still don‚Äôt shut up. They are consistently whispering in your ear which is more distracting and irritating than relaxing. I would recommend the meditation show on Netflix. Has done way more for me then this app has.
title: Unnecessary Whispering??

review: So I‚Äôve only been using this app for a few days now, but I really believe it is helping! I‚Äôve meditated a few times before in the past, but I would always have a hard time concentrating on my breathing and keeping my mind from wandering. I‚Äôve finally learned that it‚Äôs totally normal to think about other things, so that makes me feel better. The ways I‚Äôm being taught about breath focus has actually helped me think a lot less during my meditation. I‚Äôve also noticed a great decrease in anxious thoughts as well. Can‚Äôt believe this has helped so much in so little time. Now comes the work week, which is when I experience the most stress. I hope it will continue to help (which K believe it will)!
title: So Helpful!

review:
I have two small children and have been feeling burnt out and touched out lately. I downloaded the app for free as a Mother‚Äôs Day deal and I will 100% be paying for a subscription when it comes time to renew.

Yesterday was my first day using it. I started the first 5 minute meditation as part of the plan they developed for me, but I did a few additional single meditations at bedtime. Each session (35 minutes total) lowered my blood pressure and distracted me from the things that have been stressing me out. 

This morning when my three year old boy was screaming to try to get a rise out of me I was able to remember some of the visualization from a session last night and stay calm.
title: Helps relieve stress immensely and immediately

review:
This app came along during a time where money was tight and my marriage was in trouble, and it helped me develop in ways that saved it all. I was in a spot where I wanted to be dead to be away from the pain, and I was tired of so much heartache and turmoil. My way of being dead without being dead or sleeping without being asleep was meditation, because I can‚Äôt be dead and I couldn‚Äôt sleep. An ad came along and introduced this so I gave it the trial, and it taught me things I use every day to focus, stay calm and release stress. I‚Äôm a new man! 
I paid for lifetime access when the year was almost up and it‚Äôs worth every dollar. For me, it changed my life and made a big difference. I‚Äôm really grateful for it.
title: This app is essential

review:
Im an actually loyal everyday user of Balance. 
Since one year ago, Balance becomes part of my daily life with no excuse and very consistence. Balance has changed my life, and is very important to me to have it in my day by day, even more in my anxiety attacks. Balance helps me to overcome any challenge presented through my life lastly. 
 
Im currently a medstudent, and having Balance in my life have being a must, and I promise should be a must to have in your life too. 

I know that can be kind of expensive, or maybe you ask if it‚Äôs worthy to pay for it, but Balance team it‚Äôs there ALWAYS to give you a hand and helps you in the same way they are doing with me. They don‚Äôt just give you one free year of membership, they also could give you additional month as a courtesy if you practice a good communication with them and/or may apply a discount to annual subscription. They are just like us. You will not regret to interact with them, or having Balance as part of you daily habits.

Balance so important in my day that I GUARANTEE that‚Äôs it‚Äôs MUST to have it. Take the chance to change your life, and control all your situations.
title: Life saver!!! ‚ú®‚ù§Ô∏è

review: I rarely if ever write reviews, but I felt that I needed to for Balance. I tried the app because of its free for a year promotion and I‚Äôm so thankful I did. I‚Äôd tried other subscriptions to mindfulness apps but rarely followed through for more than a week or two. I am going strong for 46 days in a row with Balance. The difference to me is the personalization. I love that the messages I‚Äôm hearing during the meditation match my mood or needs. Ofosu‚Äôs voice is very calm and soothing. I‚Äôve learned more from this app in 2 months than I have from years of on and off practices that didn‚Äôt stick. I highly recommend this app and I will be continuing my subscription after my free year is over. Thank you, Balance.
title: My favorite app

review: Greatly appreciate the voice of Ofusu which is why I purchased this app. Diversity is missing in this space. I also appreciate the variety of mediations and how they are organized. I would like to see another way to track consistency other than the streak or the minute/hours. Perhaps a way to make up a streak day or total mediations completed for the week. I was up to 70 day streaks a couple of times but they got wiped out due to unexpected things that came up. I was so disheartened to start over the first time but after the second time I found it hard to re-engage and abandoned the app except for intermittently. Perfectionist issues I know but this was the reality. Thank you for always improving the app and for being open to feedback.
title: Outstanding

review: I have never written an app review and I genuinely hate doing it, so you know I really mean this one! I have suffered from PTSD and anxiety for most of my life. I have been in and out of therapy when I could afford it, working mostly on grounding techniques and guiding my thoughts. After using this app for three weeks, I can see a marked improvement in my ability to do both of these things in the moment. Big things and small things that would have stressed me out or made me have thoughts of self doubt before have just slid off my back for the past couple of weeks. I am so thankful to the creators of this app and so happy I heard about it through Elevate. It has truly made a difference in my quality of life!
title: Improved my life, saved me money on therapy

review:
I downloaded this app after seeing an ad on IG. This is not something I normally do, but after reading the amazing reviews and seeing that it was a free trial year, I decided to get it. 
This app is quite literally changing my lifestyle. I am now meditating, breathing more calmly, less anxious and best yet, sleeping better. I do still wake in the middle of the night but I just put the Back to Sleep meditation on and I do go right back to sleep. I also love that you can choose between guides- Ofosu or Leah. There are all kinds of scenes to handle all kinds of situations and now there is  even science created music to help focus. 
Please give this amazing app a try, I can‚Äôt imagine how a you could be disappointed!
title: Love this app! 5 Stars!

review:
These guided meditations are amazing. I‚Äôm still exploring all the different plans and singles and I pretty much use it every night to fall asleep AND use to Back To Sleep meditation if I ever wake up at night. 

I‚Äôm learning how to take a step back from all the stressors and curveballs life throws at ya and just BREATHE. If you really give it a shot and follow the instructions, (I love Ofosu‚Äôs soothing voice and kind words:) then I don‚Äôt see why it couldn‚Äôt help you too, right? I‚Äôve been telling all my fam about it trying to get them on board..lol maybe you‚Äôll be more likely if you‚Äôve made it this far. üòÖ

Oh also helps with focus and energy but I havnt tried those yet‚Äîgoing to start today!! Can‚Äôt wait ü§ó
title: Helps me so much with my anxiety!

review: I don‚Äôt usually rate apps, or write many reviews, but this one stood out a bit. The free year is such a good opportunity, and I love their approach on personalizing the experience for each individual. I‚Äôm new to meditation, mindfulness, and even silence. I started doing my runs with no music because I just felt that I was always distracting myself with podcasts or music or shows literally all the time throughout the day while I do other tasks. This app has been a huge help to me while I start to make these lifestyle changes and move into a less chaotic/cluttered/hazy headspace. I would recommend this to anybody honestly, especially with the free year it‚Äôs more than worth a shot.
title: Good for a cluttered mind

review: If you can spend money on an app use headspace‚Äînot this. It focuses so much on ‚Äúoptimizing‚Äù your experience that it completely misses the mark. The guide talks for at least a minute up top of every session saying the most basic, and trite things ‚Äúit‚Äôs ok if this...its ok if that...don‚Äôt worry just focus on your breathe‚Äù EVERY TIME.  The guide then talks over the entire meditation-asking you to count to five breaths, interrupting after 2 breaths and telling you to stop counting. You have to answer a series of multiple choice questions before every meditation and after rating your experience. Utter nonsense‚ÄîI can‚Äôt see how it‚Äôs ‚Äúcatered‚Äù to me at all. If it were the guide wouldn‚Äôt speak through the entire meditation and repeatedly tell me about the same benefits of meditation over and over while saying that however I answered the multiple choice question is totally normal and ok. It labors over every point and explains simple concepts excessively

review: Balance arrives on the scene where many clever meditation apps already exist. However, this app is so well considered in the classical sense of step-by-step gentle learning, that it immediately blows away many of the contemporary easy access ‚Äúmeditation for people in a hurry‚Äù. For anyone genuinely serious about learning meditation in an environment of kindness, support and gentle evolution, Balance is nothing short of superb. But what makes it different? The architecture and internal design of Balance allows the algorithms to really understand the users skill level and development and responds in an almost bespoke level of AI learning. This app is mind blowing in its infancy, imagine what it will be in 3 to 5 years.
title: Miles above the rest. Simply extraordinary!

review: I‚Äôve had this app for a month, but was only consistent for a week and I‚Äôve already noticed results. My focus is better than ever, my attention is sharper, my memory can retain information longer, and I‚Äôve been sleeping better. I look forward to my meditations every morning, they really do set such a good vibe for the day. My mental health and anxiety has improved too, even my family noticed a difference in me. Today I decided to try the gratefulness meditation after doing my daily foundation meditation and was moved to tears halfway through. I knew I had to write a review. If you are debating on buying this app I‚Äôm here to tell you that you should! It‚Äôs incredible
title: Get this app, I promise it‚Äôs worth it

review: Balance was a game changer for me as far as meditation is concerned. But even beyond that, it has helped me develop coping mechanisms and find perspective particularly during these very challenging years. I have tried Calm and Headspace, and although good, those apps did not eventually help me develop a practice. Balance, on the other hand, seemed better structured, more flexible, and ultimately more motivating so that I would look forward to meditating at least every morning, and sometimes even more. Highly recommended for anyone hoping to find better alignment with the world around them; a space to incorporate peace of mind and silence in their lives; and a nimble practice that has real-world applications.
title: Game Changer

review:
So excited to try and signed up for the 1 year free - immediately got notification from my bank that $13,75 has been deducted (the apps monthly fee plus state tax), why? 

Stress levels are already through the roof and now this. Please can you explain or reach out to correct this.

EDIT: I have upped it to 5 Stars because (1) I love the App (2) The Developer reached out to me offering assistance and (3) MOST IMPORTANTLY - I need to apologise: my son charged something to my Apple account from one of the family iPads that I didn‚Äôt know was linked to my account and it absolutely was NOT Balance - It‚Äôs free and signed up for a year - I feel awful for my haste to complain.  Thank you for the awesome App and for reaching out xo
title: Excited to try this but why was I charged?

review:
Obviously this app can‚Äôt replicate the help of a professional, but the variety of meditations and ability to choose even just a 5 minute session has been amazing.

I have dealt with anxiety since I was a toddler and up until recently I started getting anxiety attacks so I made the jump to commit to meditating. This app made it extremely easy for a beginner to get acquainted with the process.

The medication I was taking is no longer needed as I don‚Äôt feel the effects of it anymore. It took time, but I try to at least do 10 minutes every day and look to it as the biggest form of self care. This app has been the best tool I could‚Äôve purchased. Thank you for creating it!
title: The best thing I could‚Äôve purchased for my mental wellbeing

review: I downloaded this after I found out about it from the Elevate app I use and I‚Äôm so happy with it so far. I‚Äôm only on my 3rd day meditating with Balance, but so far, I really appreciate that it‚Äôs a customizable approach to meditation. A lot of other meditation apps are general and not as personal, but this one factors in what your goal of meditating is. For me, it‚Äôs focus and mood enhancing. So, it takes that into consideration along with your age and meditation experience and creates a meditation program for you. I really like how the app also has a meditation tracker too, at the end of every session it‚Äôll fill in a bubble for the day of the week you meditated, which helps keeps me accountable. Anyway, really dope app and gentle guidance, so ya girl is happy.
title: So happy with this app üßòüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

review:
This is how I described this app when I recommended it to my best friend‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
‚ÄúThey have an offer for a free year. It‚Äôs what Ive been using for meditation and breathe wotk stuff. I highly highly recommend it. There are 5, 10, &15 min options on most of the meditations. The breathe work features are 1 minute increments I believe. And there are different kinds that they teach you. There are ‚Äòfoundations‚Äô meditations and fundamentals everyday. They ask for your feedback on things and that customizes the meditation for you. You can also choose between a male or female voice. Again, highly highly recommend. Took me a bit to get familiar with the app but now I am lovvvving it‚Äù
title: Highly highly recommend

review: Many times I purchase an app without getting a chance to really see how it works for me. I end up canceling or never using it & wasting my money. This app let me try for free for a year. And as I‚Äôm trying it, I honestly love it. I love how modularly it matches my needs. I have known how to meditate & I've gotten off track the past few years. This app so far has given me a stress free re-introduction. I have already been feeling the positive effects back into my life. The last two years after the pandemic caused me to become an introvert. I am starting to feel safe & slowly coming out my shell. I highly recommend this app to anyone & everyone.
title: Surprised and very glad it‚Äôs letting me try free

review:
I‚Äôve been looking for a meditation app forever. One that fit what I was wanting to learn that wasn‚Äôt too pricey. I found this as an add on Instagram. Once I downloaded it, it let me know that the first year of their premium would be free due possibly COVID. All I know is that I was stoked to have a full year free. All other apps I‚Äôve tried give maybe a week trial and that to me is just not long enough to see if it‚Äôs a good fit. 

This app is different! It‚Äôs very user friendly and the guided meditations are relaxing. My favorite thing about this is they have a foundations of meditation that teaches you 9 skills. And it‚Äôs personalized! It asks you questions, then builds a meditation based on where you are at with learning the skills. This is exactly what I was looking for!! I wanted an app to actually teach me, instead of just giving meditations to listen to. 

I also love that it has meditations for walking. It helps teach mindfulness. 

So happy I found this. And next year when I renew, it‚Äôs only $69 a year. Which compared to others, is so reasonable. 

Thanks Balance for changing how I meditate üíú
title: Amazing

review: Balance comes in clutch for beginners learns who tryna cultivate new skills into their lives my experience utilizing balance for this pasted weekend was phenomenal I had and until this day experience amazing benefits form using this app I can stay focused on my daily activities like school and work when it came to the pandemic I was just disassemble I could put the right peace together grades was dropping an struggle financially too until Rand into this app it help me put myself back on track I‚Äôm more focused then ever I can stay calm when I‚Äôm in a tuff situation. This is my experience with this app if you are seeing this I hope you give it a try for a week I promise you see some changes if not peace and love find something much love.
title: Depression and Anxiety

review: I am trying Balance because it is free. Having tried several paid meditation apps, there are several things to like about this one. The guide voices are soothing and well done. The personalization is present, but not a game changer. I like the pace of the lessons and that this app has a lot of features. Especially for beginners, this is a great way to learn more and practice meditation. For more advanced people, there is a lot to explore with this app and nice discoveries along the way. I am sure there is a marketing and financial aspect to the free offer, but at the same time, I respect providing this production quality to everyone who is interested. Try it, you wont be sorry you did.
title: Try It

review:
This app is great and I‚Äôve been using it everyday for about two weeks now. But there is one small thing I would like the developers to add.

Balance can already write data to the Health app, but I wish it could read data from the Health app. I use multiple meditation and mindful breathing apps, and I don‚Äôt want to break my streak in Balance just because I choose to use another app one or two days a week. The app encourages you to try mindful breathing and meditation on your own. They want you to learn the skills so you don‚Äôt have to be reliant on the app. So I just wish it could read the Health app data on my phone and see that I am meditating everyday, sometimes with Balance and sometimes with something else.

Very small complaint with an otherwise excellent app.
title: Almost perfect

review: I used to be the person that thought meditation was stupid but after us using this app I find that it actually really helps me fall asleep. This worked better than apps fully designed to help you sleep. Only thing I wish for is a dedicated iPad app. Overall I would recommend this to anyone looking for a meditation app and I find this one to be the best out of all of them. It makes a plan suited just for you. When the voice talks to you it talks about just you instead of just 1 pre recorded voice message witch makes it feel personal. It is a bit on the pricy side but they have a 1 year free trial! Overall I would recommend this to anyone!
title: Actually Great

review: I‚Äôve tried both Headspace and Calm. I found them both to be too ‚Äúbusy‚Äù for a mindfulness app, cluttered with all kinds of junk and options.  I really enjoy Balance for the UI/UX. It‚Äôs minimal, almost zen-like to me. From the sound effects as you click through the various screens to the peaceful and calming voice of the female narrator of the meditations, it just works so well. I like that you are encouraged to relax in whatever position works for you during meditations, not coached in some rigid fashion like the other apps. The options are wide, yet focused in a great manner (the personalization is fantastic!) From commuting to wake up to bedtime, there are a multitude of choices. My wife and I have embraced this app and use it daily.
title: Finally a app that works for me

review:
This app is incredible. I‚Äôve been meditating for years and have tried various apps for finding guided meditations when I need them, but none compare to this. Their learning plans are great, and so are the soothing voices of Ofusu and Leah. The personalization questions that build the recording you listen to make this app an exceptionally useful tool. 

I‚Äôve learned much and improved my practice greatly since using Balance. I subscribe and recommend it to all my friends, especially fellow sufferers of PTSD, ADHD, and/or chronic pain. 

Having personalized guidance on demand whenever I need it is a lifesaver. Thank you, development team, for making such an accessible, affordable, amazing app!
title: Amazing Personalization

review: I‚Äôve used this app for a while now but was tempted to change to other more popular meditation apps‚Ä¶ I came back to this one. I like that I can use the same guide every time, it is personalized, and I can choose how long I want to meditate. Other apps all had course you could take, but they were all by different guiding voices (some I couldn‚Äôt stand) and I hated that the session times varied. I like consistency when it comes to meditation and this app is the best. If you‚Äôre doubting, don‚Äôt! This is the best meditation app out there. The courses are as in-depth as you could want and the variety is just what I need without it being overwhelming.
title: Better than the rest

review:
I don‚Äôt recommend this if you have any familiarity with mediation. It asks you questions to ‚Äúcustomize‚Äù your meditation, but nothing changes. No matter how many times I select ‚Äúmore silence‚Äù there is still an excessive amount of talking during each meditation. I‚Äôve gone through 11 days now with no noticeable increase in the silence.

Today, it asked me how familiar I was with Loving Kindness meditation. I selected ‚Äúvery‚Äù and it proceeded to give me the absolute most basic, dumbed down Loving Kindness meditation that I‚Äôve ever experienced. And this is in the ‚ÄúAdvanced‚Äù course! I was already a bit turned off by some of the other meditations, but after today I‚Äôm considering uninstalling it. 

This might be helpful if you are completely new to meditation, but I feel it‚Äôs a waste of time if you have any meditation experience at all.

As for positives, I will say is that I found the narrator‚Äôs voice quite relaxing. I especially enjoyed the garden visualization (though not as an ‚Äúadvanced‚Äù meditation...it would be great as a wind down for sleep, though), and I really liked the body scan meditation comparing one side of the body to the other. I haven‚Äôt done a body scan in that way, and it was an interesting exercise.
title: Maybe good for those who have never meditated

review: I've been looking for an app with guided meditations, but this app actually takes user feedback to tailor meditations into what the user is looking for. I chose anxiety from school/work, but they have options for better sleep, relationships, ect. I'm on the third day of my year free trial right now (which yes, is legit) and can already feel a difference in my day after meditating in the morning. I am writing this review in hope that someone out there will take advantage of the free trial and take the first step to improving mental health. They offer great advice that is applicable in pretty much any stressful situation, especially with breathing techniques. Love it so far, thank you!!
title: Good structure

review:
First, I‚Äôd like to say that people seem to love this meditation app. If it works for you, then great. I find it a bit annoying. 
I removed one star because I‚Äôm probably unnecessarily picky. The app advertises personalized meditation skills. This is superficially true at best. Personalized seems to mean adding in a blurb saying ‚Äúi know you said (blank) is important to you‚Äù, or ‚Äúthis will help with your goal of (whatever).‚Äù It‚Äôs like mad libs for meditation. I don‚Äôt see the curriculum changing, only a word or two. 
Second star is just because i don‚Äôt find the methodology compelling. This is the fourth meditation app I‚Äôve tried, and it‚Äôs probably my third favorite. 
In short,  Find what works for you and keeps you motivated. If this is it, then cool. If not, there‚Äôs a lot out there. Try others until one clicks.

review: I love this app! It‚Äôs so helpful for starting out your day and making your mind sharp and focused. When you go to bed it‚Äôs perfect to get you relaxed, calm, and worry free. Even mid day it‚Äôs helpful. I‚Äôve found myself coming to it when I‚Äôm stressed or worried and being able to calm down and just take a moment to think and solve whatever crap it is I‚Äôm worrying about this time. If your kind of skeptical about the programs actually working just please test it out for a week. I promise you won‚Äôt be disappointed. If it were possible to rate It more than a five I definitely would. Bye for now and remember to just try it for a week. You won‚Äôt regret it!
title: 10/10 app

review:
I have tried another meditation app, but I just couldn‚Äôt grasp the concepts with that one and it wasn‚Äôt working for me very well. I was never able to keep a streak going or really understand the concepts. 

With Balance, I so far have been meditating for 2 weeks straight, every day. I have a stronger grasp of the skills I‚Äôve learned and use them occasionally in my day to day life. My favorite part is that the sessions are personalized for you when you‚Äôre going through each plan so if you get a concept right away, great! Here‚Äôs some time to practice. If you‚Äôre struggling, we‚Äôll try to do it this way. It really helps me come back every day knowing that this session is tailored to my skill level.
title: Best Meditation App For Me

review: I was curious about this app, initially, because it had such a high rating. As I began to use it as a beginner, I quickly became attached to what I was learning and doing. This was before the onset of the pandemic. I self-isolated and the app has been a part of my daily experience since. My husband has noticed a difference in my level of anxiety and I also notice a difference in my level of emotional reactivity. It is nice to be able to calm myself in what, in the past, was a provocative situation. I have recommended this app to others. I am grateful to be able to use this tool to assist in life and coping with uncertainty. All this said, I heartily recommend this app!
title: Life changing

review: I paid for subscriptions to apps say they are like this but this app is truly different. This truly got rid of my entire days stress after doing my personalized daily meditation and I‚Äôm still breathing exactly same and still much more calm than my work day. This app is truly awesome and I think ü§î I will continue with it. It‚Äôs literally geared to the individual not like a blanket thing grouping people into categories.  This app is AWESOME üëè
title: 10 star awesome

review: I got the free year four months ago but just now started trying it out. I have insomnia and have been on sleeping pills for year as well as dealing with severe postpartum anxiety and anger after the birth of my second baby last November. This app has slowly helped me turn that around. The first time I used a sleep meditation I was out before it even ended. The daily meditations and anxiety ones have helped me take control of my anxiety and anger and I‚Äôm becoming more mindful in my day to day. I‚Äôve stopped snapping and lashing out at my family as much. I love this app and I‚Äôm so glad I found it. Ofosu‚Äôs voice is so relaxing, calming, and grounding.
title: Changing my thinking

review: I‚Äôve wanted to start meditating for some time now but it seemed kind of intimidating. Didn‚Äôt know what to start with, how to start, what to focus on, how long to do it, etc. So I just never did it even though I knew I needed it. Saw an ad for a free year trial so I decided there was no harm in it and I am so glad I did. I‚Äôm only a week in and while I haven‚Äôt noticed any chronic changes yet, I always feel so much better after a session so I‚Äôm confident in its long term efficacy. Well worth the price and I plan to stay subscribed after the year is up to say thanks for giving me the start I needed.
title: Was skeptical but actually an incredibly gentle introduction to meditation

review: Love the app, both from considering every meditators journey and the guides perspective. I have had failed attempts but knowing it came from Elevate developers I had high expectations and they have been easily surpassed. I am no where near a well focused person but can see how to get better slowly. Accepting distractions first and then acknowledging and then creating a better chance of them minimized is what it helps me achieve. One slight request- all the sitting meditations assume sitting on a furniture e.g. a chair, I do it sitting on the floor cross legged, appreciate incorporating that as an option or consideration when guiding or tips. Love it regardless !!!
title: Best thing this year - small request Sitting position

review: I really enjoyed Balance a lot. I have learned many new skills. In 3 months I completed all the Foundation Plans and the Advanced Plans, progressing to 20-30 minute meditations. I enjoyed the journey immensely. After completing these plans, there are only 10-15 single sessions, and most leave me wanting more. So, I thank them for getting me on the road, and will return now and again, but it‚Äôs time move on and continue to grow. Thank you, Balance folks for helping me get on the right road. I feel like a child leaving home.  I‚Äôll be back, and the times here have been special, but something out there (or, in here) is calling.üôè‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
title: Good for beginners

review: I have only used this app a few days and I am already in love! I have used other free apps but due to the effortless customization, I can use this forever! I am glad I got a year free this year and can definitely see myself using it for years to come. There are so many options to chose from depending on what you want to focus on and helps track your progress + customize your foundations daily while building your meditation skills. Ideal for the busy person who may need guidance at first but can get less guidance along the journey or choose unguided whenever you wish. There are choices of meditation guides so you can switch it up or stick with a favorite.
title: Highly Recommend

review: I definitely enjoyed my first body scan and actually think the App is one if not the best and most well organized. My only concern which has nothing to do with the operational side is the cost. Surely for $359 even if it is discounted to $99 still feels quite a bit on the higher end. And so would be loyal customers like myself could get turned off by these really steep paywalls‚Ä¶so perhaps stagger the levels so that entry level which is perhaps half the cost helps those that want to first feel things out before entering the premium. Excellent app otherwise, well done folks! 5 stars
title: We‚Äôll organized and simple to follow

review:
Wow wow wow! I don‚Äôt like most meditation apps, videos, people, or guru things. They want to mush it all up and channel your inner whatever. I get five seconds into it and I‚Äôm rolling my eyes or I go the other way and my brain is thinking about the new spreadsheet I just made. My head never stops! I started with the daily exercise, then realized they have so much more to offer. They have a section specifically for sleep! Warning, don‚Äôt use the same person for sleep as you do for your regular daily sessions lol. 

If you have a mind that never stops, have a high stress job, life, or just suffer from anxiety, this is worth every penny!
title: Works for the busiest of minds

review: At age 66 my brain muscle had become very weak. My focus was off, my comprehension was very slow, my memory and my recall was on a decline. After starting Balance meditation for approximately two months I  noticed a tremendous improvement in all of the above areas. I got too comfortable and stopped the practice. I have since returned to work after a 4 year sabbatical and  need all the brain power I can get and so I‚Äôm back. My Balance trainer is Osoufo and he is fantastic!! I love the difference this meditation practice has made in this season of my life, and the  brain power that‚Äôs being restored is quite measurable and  oh what a difference, it has made!!!
title: WHAT A DIFFERENCE!!

review:
This app feels like another example of developers focusing on look/feel and implementing some kind of fancy analytics to supposedly allow them to customize everything for your needs... But dropping the ball on the basics, making it totally useless.

I started out with the "advanced plan" after completing a survey about my current level of experience. It is not advanced at all. It feels more like a bunch of dumbed down lectures about meditation basics than actual meditations, and far from enhancing my practice, it has just been a daily source of frustration. I have to use my existing meditation skills to deal with the frustration of trying to meditate with this app lol.

The worst part is that even some of the basics they took the time to explain were explained poorly, so it wastes time for experienced users but I'm not sure how you would understand if you were inexperienced. I've been meditating for several years and this app spent several minutes talking about how my mind was like an empty garden when I first started using it, and how setting intentions is like planting seeds?? This feels like a metaphor you might use for teaching children.

Apps like Simple Habit, Buddhify, and Headspace are so much better than this, both at guiding you thru the basics and at helping you learn more advanced techniques.

title: 5/5 highly recommend

review: I love this app!  It is obvious that the team that put it together was thinking of what people need to help them become consistent about their meditation practices.  I have learned more from the guided practices here than through other similar apps because they are sequential, building upon each other, and assess my progress regularly.  The skills learned are based on research, and designed to help me improve my mental health as well.  Ofosu and    Leah are calm, gentle guides with deep knowledge of what works.  It‚Äôs just a great app - you definitely should try it - and no excuses because you get a whole full year free!
title: The only app I use for meditation and relaxation

review: I‚Äôve honestly tried quite a few meditation apps because I want to meditate but I don‚Äôt know how to do it on my own. This has been the best one by far. None of the other ones have had good options for free. I‚Äôm more of a try before you buy type person when it comes to apps, so this being mostly free and only having a premium for extras is great. The voice options are really calming and I can‚Äôt wait to further my understanding of meditation. They not only guide you through the meditations, but they teach you about the benefits of what you are doing along the way. It‚Äôs completely personalized based on your feedback, so it‚Äôs just an all around great app!
title: Best Meditation App

review:
I love this app, and everything about it. Well, ALMOST everything. Why do the singles give 15-min, 30-min, 1-hr options but then jump to 10 hours?! I want to be able to listen for my full night of sleep (7-8 hrs), but I don‚Äôt have the option to do that. It‚Äôs disappointing. Please adjust this for the next update!! 

Besides that, this app has been incredibly helpful for deep breathing, body scanning, and some other skills I have yet to discover. And Ofosu‚Äôs voice is so calming! And thanks for the free year option for the public!! It has been AMAZING to rewrite my mind without having to constantly wonder about budgeting for it. Y‚Äôall‚Äôre doing some good work here!!

title: Blessing

review:
I have been using Balance for a few weeks/months now and I honestly am so glad I decided to try it. I am a beginner to meditation and I love how personalized and encouraging the program is. The streaks and levels are really motivating, and I really enjoy the calming voice. 

Some suggestions: I think it would be awesome if we could see our progress over time and track which days we meditated over time, not just for the past week. title: Love this app!!!

review: I wanted this app for help in falling asleep. My CALM app subscription is expiring. So I wanted to see what this app offered . Calm gives me music or soundscapes that I can play for as long as I need to in order to fall asleep and it works.  I tried the sleep programs on this app and they seem to be limited to only  10 or 15 minute voice lectures. I don‚Äôt listen to the voice sleep programs on Calm because I can‚Äôt fall  asleep listening to someone talk. But that seems to be the only option on this app. Also I can‚Äôt fall asleep in only 15 minutes. I know that hours of music by well known artists costs a lot of money in royalties and advances ‚Äî so I can see why Calm costs $70 .  But this app doesn‚Äôt seem to  have any music or soundscape options and so it seems to be charging the same $70 without incurring any costs that justify that kind of charge.

title: Life Changing.

review:

title: The Best Meditations App

title: RECOMMEND TO ALL

title: My sleeping savior

title: My missing puzzle piece.

title: For me, just what I've been needing..
