review: I hardly ever write reviews but Balance definitely deserves appreciation. I had tried meditation several times before and had stopped because they became repetitive and boring after a while. Balance is well structured to add something new everyday and plans change every 10 days. The sessions surely help slow down, refocus, relax or energize but I lately realized that I adopted some of the techniques in my daily life unconsciously where I tell myself ‚Äúthinking‚Äù when distracted in a meeting or do a quick body scan to check body sensations. The creators of this app deserve all the praise and dollar earned. Thank you!
title: Extraordinary

review:
I love everything about it. After the 1 year free trial, I pay for a yearly membership. The trial was an amazing way to show me how much I‚Äôd actually use it and if it was worth the value. I won‚Äôt lie, I didn‚Äôt use it nearly as much as I thought I might BUT each use was such a high quality of sound, lesson, or experience that I couldn‚Äôt imagine not having it available when I really need it. It helps me reset my mind as needed. I‚Äôve use other apps and recordings in the past, but this is the most effective one to date! 

Also being able to track metrics is so cool! Thanks Balance üíó
title: Best Meditation App

review:
I‚Äôve used many meditation apps over the years, and Balance is by far my favorite (I‚Äôve even bought the lifetime subscription).

The meditations are always different and personalized. The app learns my preferences and adapts to my meditation growth.

But my favorite thing are the meditation coaches, Ofosu and Leah. I‚Äôve been using the app for some years now (and I also listen to the podcast), that I feel like they‚Äôre really talking to me. That fact that it‚Äôs always the two, and not a myriad of coaches makes the guidance personal. I‚Äôm at a point that I even reply when they wish me a wonderful day.
title: Personal meditation coaches

review:
Love the app. I would love for y‚Äôall to create a widget! Why? Because I‚Äôm forgetful and an animated widget allows me to see my daily progress through apps. Duo-lingo has a widget that reminds me to practice the language I‚Äôm learning and also shows me how many days I have used the app in a row. I‚Äôm at 24 days! I would love this for balance because I already feel the stress melt away when I use it but I don‚Äôt want to forget to use the app. I want to even use it more than 1 day. 

Thank you for considering. You guys rock can‚Äôt wait to fully pay for the subscription come next year! We‚Äôll worth the money!
title: 2 days in

review: Balance is now my favorite app. In just 5 minutes a day, I am learning different meditation techniques. I can already tell that my focus and stress levels are improving. The daily streak is one of my favorite parts too because I strive to go for a really long streak. My first goal is 50 days straight, then 100. I find that it is a fun way to make me want to go back everyday. Every session is personalized to your exact needs, which is wonderful. If you‚Äôre considering getting it, you won‚Äôt regret it. It‚Äôs great for beginners and more advanced meditators. This is something I‚Äôll keep around for a very long time!
title: Wonderful

review:
This app is fantastic. They have two different voices for almost all of the meditations, and both are relaxing. They have several mediation series to introduce you to the practice and guide you through the many different skills which is dope. You answer a couple of easy questions in the beginning of some of the mediations to tailor future mediations to your preferences and needs. They also offered me a 1 year free trial of the premium version of the app due to the stress many people are facing during Covid-19 which I thought was incredibly thoughtful. I have literally nothing negative to say about this app. 

Download it rn.
title: The Absolute Best

review:
In one of the sessions, I realized that I basically lived with my tongue glued to the roof of my mouth by stress ‚Äî kind of like the hostage in Free Guy who couldn‚Äôt put his arms down. 

With a month or so of being conscious of this, I now (mostly) have a relaxed tongue for the first time in‚Ä¶ decades?

I‚Äôm the target audience for this app: someone who WANTS to be good at meditation, but has never learned the HOW. 

I really loved the lessons that other apps were walking me through, but they were more like mental exercises vs actual meditations for me. 

Balance plans have taught me HOW to meditate and I‚Äôm enjoying it so much that I‚Äôve become an evangelist. 

For the people who complain about the cost: the first year is free and you can do a lot in a year. I‚Äôve only been using it for 6mo and wow have I learned so much. But also: free apps are paid for by the ads on the screen bc someone has to pay for them. I would much rather adjust my budget to invest in my mental health than sell out my meditation time as ad space.
title: Tongue stress?

review: I find that most of them are pretty gimmicky and don‚Äôt really feel like I can connect with them. Balance definitely changed that for me. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs the approach with the tailored Balance plans, but man I actually look forward to 8pm now to spend those 10 minutes with just myself and this app. I‚Äôm really looking forward to running through all of my plans. From a person suffering with severe anxiety, depression and phobic issues, I just want to say thank you to the creators of Balance. I really do believe that this is helping and I‚Äôm super thankful.
title: I‚Äôve tried a lot of meditation apps.

review: I was super excited when Balance came into my life and they offered me an entire year free. I‚Äôve gained a different sense of peace in my mornings and have learned a few techniques to deal with stress, boost my mood, add a little more oomf to my energy level, when I have trouble sleeping theres something here for that as well. I would like to be more consistent with it, but that‚Äôs a personal side note. Balance is really great for anyone who wants to get into meditation, likes a more guided meditation approach, honestly it‚Äôs great for anyone. Truly grateful for this app. Osafu‚Äôs voice is my favorite - so peaceful, calming and genuine. Thanks so much Balance!
title: So grateful

review: It‚Äôs amazing as it is right now, but I wish it had a soothing sounds folder because when I feel anxiety I need to listen to ocean waves and natural sounds to sooth myself. It would be nice to just have that on the app. If you choose to add that I would be very glad if you just keep it as a separated folder with sounds not as a backtrack to the guided meditation because I like the meditation how you have it right now. I just need natural sounds and native flutes to sooth myself while I‚Äôm working or doing school. I cancelled my subscription to headspace because I really like balance and will get a subscription here. Thank you it‚Äôs a great app...
title: Amazing but I need soothing sound file
userName: i would work for good grades

review:
I am so happy that I found this app!  As a regular user and subscriber of the Calm app, I was looking for something to take my practice a bit deeper and to change it up a bit.  

The first amazing thing is that they‚Äôre currently giving a free FULL YEAR to try it.  Two week trials are nice but I feel that by having a full year you really have enough time to see if you like it and if you‚Äôll stick with it, and/or if you‚Äôll get bored of it too quickly.

I like that you can customize the session times, most sessions in a plan can be modified to either 10 or 15 mins, and with singles you can do even just 5 mins!  They have many 10 day plans to choose from to target specific goals.  I also like the personalization aspect of the app and how it creates sessions based on questions I answer.  

My only fear is that if I continue with the app after the first year that I might run out of sessions/plans (although there are many!) so I hope they keep adding to the library as time goes on.
title: New Favorite Meditation App!

review: I have been using this app for five months and feel that I have greatly benefited from its use.  The only two helpful suggestions that I have are (1) please incorporate Ofosu into the advanced plans so that we have a choice between his voice and Leah‚Äôs.  No disrespect to Leah, because she‚Äôs great, but I find that Ofosu‚Äôs voice has a more soothing quality, at least for me; and (2) please decrease the talking when we are trying to practice the methods.  Especially during the shorter sessions.  I find it hard to concentrate when the trainer is constantly offering tips, and by the time I find my focus, the session is over.  Overall, I do highly recommend this app.
title: Great, but two helpful suggestions

review:
So far I love this app. I‚Äôve been meditating for years and teach meditation as well as some adjacent modalities and I‚Äôve been pleasantly surprised by how challenging, engaging, and nice it has been to engage my practice in this way. 

The app helps push me out of comfort zone in my practice and in spite of years of training I don‚Äôt find that I get bored or that I‚Äôm being taught below my level when doing the advanced plans. I‚Äôve also enjoyed using mini meditations through the day. 

My only complaint is that there‚Äôs too much screen engagement needed first thing in the morning. I‚Äôm an early bird meditation type and I really prefer not to look at screens before a certain hour. Because of the way meditations are set up I have to engage with looking at my phone more than I would like in the morning. 

In an ideal world I‚Äôd be able to use a voice command to take me straight into a meditation without having to look at my phone at all, but even just a ‚Äúone click‚Äù would be appreciated.
title: Excellent for advanced practice as well

review: I am very stressed with college courses, work, and have been extra stressed lately. I downloaded Elevate and subscribed to it because I love brain games to help you build math and reading skills, with that I got a year of Balance for free. I didn't initially want to try it but my boyfriend talked me into it and I'm so glad he did. We did some of the couple's meditations, and we've both used it separately and we love it! It has been helping me be more focused in school and more mindful of the physical symptoms of anxiety and experience and using the skills they have you practice has helped me significantly.
title: I love this !

review:
I‚Äôve been using balance for the past few months and I really enjoy it. It‚Äôs a good mix of programs and singles, I really enjoy going to the app when I feel like I need to adjust my mood or energy, either to ground myself, focus, relax, or even energize myself.

I recently got an apple watch, and I‚Äôve been trying to limit time on my phone and have found myself wishing I could use it on my watch so I could leave my phone out of my room at night. 

Either way, I‚Äôve found this app to be a great addition to my life. Thanks!
title: I love the app! I wish there was a watch app companion!

review:
I‚Äôve been using this app for a couple months now. It‚Äôs really good and if you‚Äôre new to this than I‚Äôd highly recommend this for you.  The one other thing I‚Äôd recommend is giving me an option for a widget on my Home Screen. Right, there is none.  If you could fix that I'm sure we all would appreciate that feature.
title: One of the best

review: I‚Äôve always tried to meditate but have never been successful or consistent. Balance has changed that for me.  I think that starting with three minutes and the foundation building in the first 10 days has made the difference. I am really enjoying this app. The voice that guides you through each meditation is soothing and I love that there are different guided meditations depending on what your need is. I can also feel the difference meditation is having on my sleep and focus.  This app is great and I will definitely subscribe after my free year trial is up!
title: Balance makes it easy

review:
I began using this app about 2 years ago, and loved it. So much so that I got the lifetime subscription when it went on sale earlier in the year so that I could have access to all the plans I so much enjoyed. 
In the last 6 months or so, the quality has dropped immensely. No more session ratings. Too much talking and not enough silence. Only giving you the option to choose the ‚Äòbreathe‚Äô meditation for 1-3 minutes (compared to up to 15 before) and my question is- why? They‚Äôre taking all the good parts of the app out (aka the personalization aspect) that made it good in the first place. Very disappointed. I have a discounted headspace subscription through my job and have been using that as well, and honestly I am beginning to like it better. Not sure what balance is doing
title: Used to be better

review: This app has given me so much! I feel like I have so much more autonomy over my emotions and am able to handle difficult situations in life with a sense of peace. I do maybe 30 minutes a week which is not a ton but even with that low commitment I have seen so much improvement
title: Life changing

review: I love this app. I found out about Balance through an Instagram ad, and decided to give the 1-year trial a shot. My favorite part is that whenever I am in an emotional state or stressed, I can lean on this app. It is like having a friend/therapist in my pocket. Thank you Balance! Great work.
title: Meditation Made Easy

review: I‚Äôm taking advantage of the one free year‚Äîbecause what could it hurt? And it has changed so much in just about a week. I‚Äôm more conscious of my feelings. I have more tools to feel and work with my emotions. I go to sleep easier and more deeply. It‚Äôs a great way to find a couple minutes to yourself. I look forward to ending my day with this app and these meditations. It‚Äôs really inspired me to be more present with myself and find time to be with myself. Highly highly recommend this app and it‚Äôs meditation!!! (also shoutout Ofuso, the voice of my meditations, i love him!!!!)
title: Best app I‚Äôve downloaded

review: love the way this app is designed for so many reasons- aesthetic, easy organization, simple design, and all the customizations are really helpful. having the option for a 3-5minute or a 10-15+ meditation is really helpful too. I got the free year subscription, and it‚Äôs coming up to renew, and despite the price for a year, for me it feels worth it! i‚Äôve just had a hard time with other meditation apps and i really like how straightforward it is. the free meditation apps also do the job for me, but if you can afford it, the design and set up make a huge difference for me.
title: makes it so easy

review:
I love this app. The guided meditations are enjoyable, challenging, yet accessible. It has a clean layout that is user-friendly and easy to navigate. 

Balance is unique among meditation apps (in my experience) because meditations vary according to goals you identify at the beginning & your feedback on how you feel about your progress or lack thereof daily. At the halfway point in meditation plans, a few simple questions assess how well you're retaining the material you've covered then adjusts your path going forward. This all results in a richer, more unique meditation experience. 

My favorite feature though has to be the Immersive Meditations. These utilize your device‚Äôs haptics to engage your sense of touch and motion to deepen your experience. I haven't come across that in any other app like this. 

Balance sets you up to meet your goals by employing components of your smart device and user experience that aren't commonly engaged in other apps like it.
title: My favorite meditation app

review: After experimenting with many of the popular meditation apps out there, I‚Äôve concluded Balance is the best. It‚Äôs very simple and easy to use, yet powerful and highly customizable to your individual preferences. Even if it was the same price as its competitors, such as Calm or Headspace, I‚Äôd go with Balance - the fact that it‚Äôs only $50 per year instead of $70+ makes the decision that much easier. My only complaint/suggestion is that it has no Watch app yet - I recently got an Apple Watch and the ability to start a mediation without even touching my phone sounds that much more therapeutic. Hopefully they add that in the future!
title: Amazing.

review:
This is seriously the best meditation app! I have tried Headspace and Calm and although those have some pros, I think Balance takes the win. One thing I love is how cleanly designed the app is. It‚Äôs calming and neutral to look at as well as to navigate. A lot of the apps feel overstimulating with so many images and colors, which is the opposite of what I want to feel when I go to meditate. Balance is all truly about the meditations, no gimmicks, no snazzy designs, just a calming app and calming meditations‚Ä¶exactly what I want. 

Since starting Balance in January 2023, I have had the most consistent meditation practice I‚Äôve ever had. It‚Äôs been such a huge help to my mental health and I‚Äôm so happy this app was created!  

I love the new feature they‚Äôve added recently with a daily affirmation. I wish I could favorite them! Every single one feels thoughtful, unique and always seems to be perfect for whatever I‚Äôm feeling.

Highly highly recommend this app!!
title: Best Meditation App

review: I got targeted with a free trial ad on IG and glad I gave it a go. I plan to purchase at the end of my trial as I work in a high stress live events production world that‚Äôs go-go-go all the time and this app has really helped me decompress throughout the day and better manage anxiety & stress, along with helping me falling asleep at night when my mind is racing with next day‚Äôs details. The immersive experiences are really cool, I was skeptical they‚Äôd actually work but they really do. I haven‚Äôt finished many sleep meditations as I‚Äôm out before they finish, which I think is a great sign. Give it a try at least!

review: I really appreciate a full one year trial. I was surprised to not be pushed to buy it along the way, but when a sale came along, I felt like it was absolutely worth buying. I‚Äôve tried other meditation apps, and I feel like this is as good as any of them. I think the pricing model, including the trial, are superior though. title: Generous trial, gentle asks

review: I have tried a few different sleep apps, and though I am early in my journey using balance, I have found this app to be very effective in calming and grounding my mind.  One of the unique features of this app is the immersion meditations.  I recently tried the Forest Immersion, and experienced such a deep calming as I felt vibrations in my my hand while holding the phone during the session.  I am hoping they have more immersion meditations like this as it was very effective in calming the thoughts running through my head.  Highly recommend giving Balance a try!
title: Very effective meditation app

review: I love this app! Every meditation plan is tailored specifically to me, my needs and where I am mentally and spiritually. I like how it gathers information before developing a plan for me and how it walks me through basic meditation practices and teaches me how to use those very strategies in my day-to-day. There are also singles that I can search through and choose, depending on my need, such as the gratitude single or stress single. Overall, I‚Äôm grateful that a friend introduced me to this app and that they were offering free subscriptions due to COVID-19. I never would‚Äôve tried it otherwise and now, when it renews, I know it‚Äôs worth paying for!
title: Great for beginners!

review:
This app is amazing in its simplistic and interactive UI, that helps a huge amount when it comes to meditation, it makes learning this confusing subject way easier and more fun. 
One thing that makes this app great is the ability use at any time of the day, everyone(including the busiest) has 5-10 minutes, why not stop making an excuse and get started :)

However I was using the communication lessons, when I realized that the body awareness(like your posture and what it could communicate) activity didn‚Äôt have a single. If one could be implemented that would be absolutely awesome!
title: Amazing app, but one request

review:
The layout is clean and the app really helps you the see the big picture of what you can achieve at the end of consistent meditation over months. Everything is guided, so all you have to do is spare some time and start the app. Can‚Äôt really get better than that. This app boils down a lot of mindfulness research progress, so you don‚Äôt have to dig different sources on the internet. 
Big thanks to the team for making it free for a year. I am, like many others, stressing out about our current situation and meditation is absolutely helping. Thanks!
title: Great App with amazing clarity of concepts!

review:
I‚Äôve tried other apps for meditation and relaxation. The voice in this app never startles me when there is a lull in speaking during the meditation. You are given plenty of time to really breathe deep before the next deep breath. I really like that. Nothing seems hurried, just calming. The voice is very soothing and helps me relax. 
There are many options to choose from. Things to calm, to reduce anxiety, to help with sleep, creativity and more. You can set schedules to remind you to practice each day. 
I‚Äôve sent it to a few friends and they love it too. Highly recommended!
title: Excellent App!

review:
I adore this app.  Really helping me with life. I‚Äôm using all of it!  Every section. I‚Äôve tried meditation before but it‚Äôs never impacted me in such a wonderful way and so quickly.  I‚Äôm sleeping so much better!

I would love the see the white noise made attachable to sleep meditations. In other words when the sleep meditation ends one can opt to have the white noise start and last for whatever amount of time we‚Äôve chosen.  

Another suggestion is that the sessions can Be scheduled.  Would specifically use this feature for the wake up meditation.
title: Love it - Adore It. I have two suggestions.

All I can see is the wind down items, not the morning items like the meditation over cup of coffee or tea. So, the app wants me to wind down, just when my work day is getting started. Also, it wants me to wind up when I am getting ready for bed. We need to be able to custom program our days start times and end times. review: I‚Äôve been meditating for years, yet still I find so much more to get involved with balance app . Day by day you grow with it, it‚Äôs brilliant intuitive design, excellent instructors and immersive daily meditations have really strengthened my practice. Very rarely do you see a company giveaway a years subscription for free especially at this quality. I can only hope more people get onboard and let meditation become a part of their daily routine for the rest of their lives. The world will become a more calming and caring place to be. Thank you for this !!
title: Best meditation app for all levels !!

review:
I‚Äôve been meditating for ten years.  However, my practice goes through lulls where I feel like I‚Äôm getting nothing out of it or not engaged.  I was in one of those lulls and after trying a few of the other apps and being largely unsuccessful, I turned to Balance.

I‚Äôm completely blown away by the quality of the app, from the design to the meditation style to the price point (they offer a pay what you want price for the first year!!).  

Huge THANKS to the entire Balance team!  I‚Äôm finally coming back home to myself!
title: Reignited my practice!

review: I‚Äôve tried many meditation apps to develop a regular practice and Balance has been the only app so far that‚Äôs helped me develop something and stick with it. I love their daily challenge (I activated a push notification to remind myself to do it) and the options of 5 or 10 minute durations, which helps me fit it in when I‚Äôm too busy. Plus it‚Äôs streamlined, user friendly, and very effective. I am only about two weeks in but I‚Äôve never felt so effortless in prior attempts to develop a meditation practice. I‚Äôm hooked!
title: I actually stick to a meditation practice now

review: I have used and greatly benefited from Headspace and Calm in the past, but in the battle to be most popular app, both have become too busy, overstuffed, and commercial for me (videos, celebrities, etc). Balance offers much the same type of content but in a very Zen-like and simple interface with the added benefit of customized guided meditations based on questions you answer about your past experiences. Add to that the current promotion for a free year and a very reasonable lifetime subscription fee and this has become my new favorite meditation app.
title: My new favorite meditation app

review: I‚Äôve tried headspace which is supposed to be the best meditation app‚Ä¶ but it was way too complicated and in my opinion there were too many types to choose from. With my ADHD I just got overwhelmed or wasted time scrolling through all the choices. I just want a simple routine with my favorite meditations that just get straight to the point. And that‚Äôs what balance does. It has science-based tips to understand why you‚Äôre doing this and how it can benefit you in a simple and quick non-distracting way. Simple and convenient. Just the way I like it.
title: BEST MEDITATION APP (in my opinion)

review: I am a psychotherapist, and this is the app that I recommend for all my anxious and depressed clients. I love how it takes them from the beginning point and sequentially brings them up through levels of meditation and how adaptive it is so that people don‚Äôt get bored with it like they do with other meditations that play the same tape over and over again. I‚Äôve had great success with this personally as well. The fact that they‚Äôve given it away free for a year during the pandemic I think also speaks well of the company culture.
title: Best meditation app I‚Äôve found

title: Gets toddler to sleep every time in less than 20 mins

review:
I have a few mental health issues and concerns, I think I came across this app in a game I play. While I am all about free things, I don‚Äôt mind paying for quality things. I have used three different meditations and today has felt so much better than yesterday. At lunch today I was on the verge of tears, so I pulled up a meditation to do while waiting for lunch to cool down. When I went back to work I was relaxed, but focused. 

I love that it isn‚Äôt all at once, tracks progress, offers meditations for different things in life, and is in small segments.
title: Worth It

review: Lately I have been under pressure, had lots of anxiety, and just been stressed out in general. But after I found this app, I have felt so much more focused, calm, relaxed, and I am in a better mood too! I definitely recommend this app if you need more help with focusing in school, or even just your at home life! - more unguided sessions. Maybe a prompt in the beginning and then silence. (There is one unguided option at this point.) A lot of the time there is just too much talking, and while the info is useful, it can be distracting and even annoying. (Could be just me.) I need more time to sit in silence.
- options to use the interactive waves and storm sessions without vibration. I‚Äôd love to meditate with the sounds and not have the feeling.
Meditating is a lot of things, and sometimes it‚Äôs just sitting with yourself and breathing. I‚Äôd love to see more if that within Balance.
Otherwise, I highly recommend this app!

review:
I am 76 years old and have never tried to meditate before. This will clearly be a life-changing experience for me. I have a good deal of muscle pain from windsurfing. I am seeing a cranial sacral therapist for this and have started to use some of the skills I am learning from this meditation instruction to more deeply participate in the energy transfer of the therapist. 

Today I sat on my front porch.  I smelled the change in the temperature of the air. I heard the sea gulls. I felt the breeze on my skin. I saw the deep blue sea, the light blue sky  and the grey and white clouds. Every breath was and is a blessing.

title: Great app for sure

review: I‚Äôm very new to meditating and have tried it before, but this app is very helpful and has been able to get me into it a lot more better and easier. Having a daily reminder and sort of routine can also help things a lot and I love that it sort of tracks down your progress the more you go along. Recently I have been a little stressed and down and I never realized how great meditation is and how much it can clear your mind. I highly suggest people get this app, as it‚Äôs also free and very therapeutic!
title: Very Good!

review:
TL;DR: Balance is unlike any other meditation app. 

I was lucky enough to get Balance during testing. At first, I thought it might be another meditation app it a somewhat crowded space.

It‚Äôs not, guys.

It‚Äôs totally customized to you. And the customization doesn‚Äôt just stop after a first-use survey; the app learns with your usage and your feedback. 

The app is beautifully designed and easy to use. Just looking at the colors is soothing. And the cool little quasi- people they used in their designs make me happy.

The voice of the female meditation coach is little butter. And the sound is well done - it‚Äôs like she‚Äôs in the room rocking me gently to sleep. I use the app mainly for sleep and it‚Äôs helped me immensely. I plan to master  the more traditional meditation features in the coming weeks. 

Thank you so much for creating Balance. I‚Äôm lucky to have this resource at my disposal.
title: Customized to you!

review: Just as I said in the title, this app has single-handedly helped me through anxiety, depression, the loss of a pet, etc. The UI is extremely simple, unlike how cluttered and confusing Headspace has unfortunately become, and the meditations are extremely helpful. I can‚Äôt believe I‚Äôm able to use this for free for a year and I will GLADLY pay the amount to renew my subscription. Recommending to everyone I know that‚Äôs interested in trying meditation. THANK YOU!!!
title: I left Headspace for this app.

review: Balance has helped me to get more restful sleep, wake up easier, release tension, stress less, and feel more relaxed and calm throughout the day. I use this app at least two-three times every day and it is sooo impactful for me. Everything is organized so nicely. It‚Äôs calming to browse through and listen to various meditations. I just wish there were more voice options. I have no complaints though. This app is pretty much perfect!
title: I Am Loving This App!

review: I‚Äôm quite a skeptical person, but I‚Äôm up to trying almost anything once, and I‚Äôm SO glad I downloaded this app. With two jobs and a two year old, I hold a lot of stress. That being said, every time I meditate with this app, I‚Äôm pleasantly surprised with how much it helps me melt that stress away. My mood and focus improves so much, and I love it. I wish I could get my friends and family to use this app too because it‚Äôs fantastic. Take it from a skeptic like me, this app WORKS.

title: The best suggestion anyone has ever made for me

review: I am so happy to have downloaded this app! For the first time, I am happy to say that I have found something that could successfully guide me through a meditation without seemingly cheesy messages and unnerving voices. This guided meditations ACTUALLY have thought out into them. I am remained ‚Äúnew‚Äù to meditation because everything that I had experienced prior to this app was lame and annoying. I am so so so happy! There are also SO many options on there!!! Love it!
title: Great Guidance and Perfect Voice

review: I‚Äôm a clinical therapist and long-time meditation practitioner, and I‚Äôm very impressed with the Balance app. The guided meditations are tailored to experience level, which I find engaging and appropriately challenging. I think anyone following these guided meditations has a real opportunity to build important skills, and that a more engaging and fulfilling life may follow. I‚Äôm already recommending this app to friends and family, and will recommend it to my therapy clients are well. This is the real deal, folks.
title: Very impressed!

review:
I‚Äôve tried for so long to get a consistent meditation practice and always failed. This app has been working so well for a few reasons. 

1. It‚Äôs incredibly simple and straightforward. The plans give you a recommended practice for your day but if you want to do a single it lets you pick by subject. This is great because I often jump to the app for a specific subject to meditate on. 

2. Aside from choosing from 2 voices, it allows you to change the length of the practice. This varies from 3 mins to sometimes 30. The one drawback I would say is there is not a long form (1 hour or more) practice. This isn‚Äôt a huge drawback because it‚Äôs so rare to do that but it would be so great when the moment strikes to go for something longer. 

3. THE SLEEP PROGRAMS. These are the best features IMO. 

 Overall the premium is worth ever penny. Thank you Balance!
title: Finally

review: I opened this app to help myself doze off to sleep within the first time of using it I was sleeping 15 minutes into the hour long nighttime sleeping meditation. The breath work mixed within the meditation helps to slow down and focus on what in front of you. Have been using it every night to secure a nights rest. Just started using the morning meditations as well and that‚Äôs also a delight. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
title: Sleeping in no time

review: This app is AMAZING and I can‚Äôt stop raving about it to my friends. I absolutely love the foundations program. I‚Äôve tried headspace, all of the other meditation apps and this one has been the BEST one. I‚Äôve been trying to meditate for years and this app has been the only thing that has helped me stick to it. I really enjoy my practices and now look forward to my meditation sessions every day. title: My first review for an app!

In fact, they caused much more harm than any good that they have done for me. But with this application, my sleep is continually improving without drugs of any kind. And if it‚Äôs addictive, that‚Äôs a good thing! The cumulative effect of using this app will astound you! Can‚Äôt say enough good things!
title: Life changing experienceL

Other Apps are similar and i personally feel it takes away a certain amount of credibility.  A more polished, professional appearance would add depth to the App.

It‚Äôs changed my life after 15 days and I cannot wait to see where I get. Thank you so much.
title: Life Changing

review: I‚Äôve used a couple other meditation/relaxing apps to help with my anxiety, and this one has far surpassed my expectations. title: This app is the best one I‚Äôve tried.

review:
For whatever reason, I have always felt a sense of anxiety when I would focus on my breathing, as if focusing on my mind and body was a bad thing, like I needed to constantly distract myself from, well, myself. But with the way these meditations are crafted, I was able to overcome that irrational thinking and relax into my own breathing and body. 

I seriously cannot thank you enough for this feeling of comfort and relaxation after years of intense anxiety. I feel like I finally have found a breath of fresh air. üíó
title: Thank you.

review: There is too much guidance from the coach in my opinion. I ask for more silence after every meditation because in general there are only 4-5 periods of silence each no more than 10 seconds. It is difficult to focus. A 10 minute meditation should have at least 2-2.5 minutes of silence to practice meditation and the skills presented in the app. Maybe I should not have started with the beginner plan, but I am trying to work through Balances system. Even the second foundations plan has the coach talking almost the entire session.
title: A good way to get into meditation, but‚Ä¶
developerResponse: {'id': 23376639, 'body': "Thank you for contacting us with this feedback! It's good for us to hear that you would benefit from longer periods of silence in the audio meditations. As you progress through the Foundations series you will see this happen naturally. However, if you'd like to change it over time sooner please fill out the session rating at the end of each meditation. If you choose 1, 2, or 3 stars you will automatically be taken to a screen that allows you to choose more silence. Your input will then be accounted for and your sessions will incrementally increase periods of silence (in small amounts over time) to fit with your requests. Additionally, if you choose the longer durations, your meditations will also have more silence. If you have any more questions or feedback, email us anytime at support@balanceapp.com.", 'modified': '2021-06-14T16:39:21Z'}

title: Great start!

review:
Having been an avid user of Elevate, I was asked to beta this app, Balance.

I have (had) no background in meditation and honestly not any interest taking it up. In fact, early on I suggested they might add something that suggests why I would want to meditate in the first place. But, they asked for my help so I tried to give it.

I never really got invested in meditation while doing this daily, but interestingly I did notice many of the techniques were quite helpful and over time I did find myself thinking about and sometimes using them outside the app. 

So...if meditation is your thing I think you‚Äôll find it fantastic. If meditation is not? Give it a try anyways for 21 days then decide. There are handy things that help you calm yourself when you want to lash out at someone, among other things.

Whether it was the sleep function or the wake up meditation I love this app and will continue to be a loyal customer to Balance. Thank you, Balance, for being an amazing tool.
title: Better than the others!

review:
I have no words to describe the gratitude I have for the high standard and quality of this app and for the team behind it. It has truly upgraded my life. 
I had never meditated before and now with Balance I have found not only peace, focus, and calm, but also a partner for my journey of self-awareness, connectedness, and fulfillment. 
I am a raving fan, and I will forever remember Balance as a major stepping stone that helped shift my life in the right direction.
title: A high quality life changing app!

review:
Wow, I haven‚Äôt mediated in ages nor have I ever really found the groove to keep the meditation consistent.

Balance is incredibly simple to operate and is tailored specifically to your needs and goals. It‚Äôs so awesome you‚Äôre able to rate each meditation session afterwards. There is also review questions sometimes before a mediation, which helps adjusts the meditation plan based off of your responses.

It‚Äôs amazing how Balance practically turns a newbie to a consistent meditator over a few weeks. Consistency is definitely key and the rewards/badge system is a great user incentive.

These are certainly some stressful times with a lot going on the media, and I have found Balance to allow me to focus on what‚Äôs important and the things that are within my control.

Thank you Balance team!!!!
title: THANKFUL for Balance

review: I never meditated before but recently find the need to and since I knew about Balance from Elevate I thought this would be a perfect time to give it a try. I only started a few days ago and noticing slight improvements in the areas I wanted to focus on. Thanks guys :)

review: I really like this app. The meditations are great and the voices are very relaxing. However I am upset about the subscription details. My suggestion is to make separate prices for each meditation/plan an option, or people can choose to pay for the entire subscription. Besides that, I really like it, and if these changes are made I will probably look into purchasing locked meditations and plans.

I loom forward to continue using Balance on a regular basis now.

title: Amazing experiences

review:
I‚Äôve tried all the different mediation apps and balance is by far my favorite.

What it does well:
-Balance is highly customizable. The app learns your experience level and allows you to adjust mediation length based on what works for you.
-Skill teaching. Balance is above and away the best app at teaching the skills (naming, breathing, etc) that under pin a good meditation practice.
-sound and teacher. The actual instructor has an excellent voice and is quite soothing.
-lastly, balance is very good at tracking your progress and allowing a beginner (like me) to ease my way into learning meditation and building a practice.

I‚Äôve tried headspace and other apps and none of them stuck. Balance did so that alone is a major difference.

title: Talks too much

title: Balance.

review:
The people who did this are obviously lovely lovely people. And if you‚Äôre an absolute beginner I‚Äôm sure this is great

But for those of us with some experience...I didn‚Äôt find it ideal, certainly. The main problem I had with it is that in meditations that are supposed to be focus meditations (breath counting and the like, not visualizations where guidance is obviously more appropriate) there was just too much narration. I found it extremely distracting. 

If that‚Äôs not going to be an issue for you, if a pleasant voice urging you to ‚Äújust keep your attention on the breath‚Äù after a mere five minutes of just that won‚Äôt be a problem, I recommend this. I‚Äôm just not zen enough yet to keep my awareness shifting to everything and not get entirely distracted ...

Give it a try, though, it might be right for you
title: Not for everyone

title: Exceptional App

review: I just sent feedback to the email provided regarding the ‚Äúdiaphragmatic breathing‚Äù exercise. I love this app, but they‚Äôve got this process backward, which causes anxiety. Diaphragmatic breathing is deep, in the abdomen, through use of the diaphragm. This app is instructing the user to restrict their diaphragm and breathe on such a way that exacerbates fight or flight. Despite what the guide says, this type of breathing- when done correctly- should NEVER cause anxiety. I am disappointed that an app like this can get something so fundamental so wrong.
